vShieldSolutionActivate /{vendorID}/{altitude} post

Activate a registered vShield solution

post

Activate a solution that has been registered and located

post vShieldSolutionActivate /2.0/endpointsecurity/activation/{vendorID}/{altitude}

Activate a solution that has been registered and located

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • vendorID: required (string)

    VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

  • altitude: required (string)

    VMware-assigned number to uniquely identify a solution. Describes the type of solution and the order in which the solution receives events relative to other solutions on the same host

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="ActivationInfo">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="moid"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<ActivationInfo>
  <moid></moid>
</ActivationInfo>
Secured by basic

vShieldSolutionDeactivate /{moid} delete

Deactivate a solution on a host

delete

Deactivate a solution on a host

delete vShieldSolutionDeactivate /2.0/endpointsecurity/activation/{vendorID}/{altitude}/{moid}

Deactivate a solution on a host

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • vendorID: required (string)

    VMware-assigned ID for the vendor

  • altitude: required (string)

    VMware-assigned number to uniquely identify a solution. Describes the type of solution and the order in which the solution receives events relative to other solutions on the same host

  • moid: required (string)

    Managed object reference of VM

Secured by basic

dfw

Distributed Firewall Operations

dfwConfig /globalroot-0/config get put delete

Global Distributed Firewall Rules configuration

get

Global Distributed Firewall Rules configuration, use query Parameters to filter

put

This will update the complete firewall configuration in all sections. You will need to get the Etag value out of the GET (dfwConfigShow) first. Then pass the modified version of the whole firewall configuration in the GET body

delete

Restores default configuration, which means one defaultLayer3 section with default allow rule and one defaultLayer2Section with default allow rule

get dfwConfig /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config

Global Distributed Firewall Rules configuration, use query Parameters to filter

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Query Parameters

  • ruleType: (string)

    ruleType can be LAYER3, LAYER2, L3REDIRECT. Rule Type is mandatory if other search parameters are sent

  • source: (string)

    source/destination can contain IPv4/v6 address or vm‐id

  • ruleId: (string)

    filter by ruleId

  • comment: (string)

    Comment can contain any portion of the comment entered for the rules. Search is case insensitive

  • name: (string)

    Name can contain any portion of the rulename entered for the rules. Search is case insensitive

  • siProfile: (string)

    siProfile can contain any portion of the ServiceProfile name associated with L3redirectrule. Search is case insensitive.

  • edgeId: (string)

    edgeId is the EdgeID, that displays rules applicable to the specified Edge

  • action: (string)

    Filter for specific action (allow, deny)

Secured by basic

put dfwConfig /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config

This will update the complete firewall configuration in all sections. You will need to get the Etag value out of the GET (dfwConfigShow) first. Then pass the modified version of the whole firewall configuration in the GET body

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Headers

  • if-match: required (string)

    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Body

Type: application/xml

Example:

<firewallConfiguration timestamp="">
  <contextId></contextId>
  <layer3Sections>
    <section id="defaultSectionLayer3" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
      <rule disabled="" logged="">
        <name></name>
        <action></action>
        <sources excluded="false">
          <source>
            <value></value>
            <type></type>
          </source>
        </sources>
        <services>
          <service>
            <destinationPort></destinationPort>
            <protocol></protocol>
            <subProtocol></subProtocol>
            </service>
        </services>
        <appliedToList>
          <appliedTo>
            <value></value>
            <type></type>
          </appliedTo>
        </appliedToList>
      </rule>
    </section>
  </layer3Sections>
  <layer2Sections>
    <section id="1" name="defaultSectionLayer2" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
      <rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
        <name></name>
        <action></action>
        <sectionId></sectionId>
      </rule>
    </section>
  </layer2Sections>
</firewallConfiguration>
Secured by basic

delete dfwConfig /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config

Restores default configuration, which means one defaultLayer3 section with default allow rule and one defaultLayer2Section with default allow rule

Secured by basic
  • Security
Secured by basic

dfwL3Section /layer3sections get post

L3 Firewall Operations on specific section specified by name (in a query Parameter)

get

Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by name

post

Creates a new L3 Firewall Section with a number of rules

get dfwL3Section /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections

Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by name

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Query Parameters

  • name: (string)

    Name of the Section to read

Secured by basic

post dfwL3Section /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections

Creates a new L3 Firewall Section with a number of rules

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="section">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="rule" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0">
          <xs:complexType mixed="true">
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
              <xs:element name="appliedToList" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="appliedTo">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="sources" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="source">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                  <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="excluded"/>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="destinations" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="destination">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                  <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="excluded"/>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="services" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="service">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="destinationPort"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subProtocol"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled" use="optional"/>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged" use="optional"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="managedBy"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="type"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<section name="" managedBy="" type="">
  <rule disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
      <appliedTo>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sources excluded="">
      <source>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </source>
    </sources>
    <destinations excluded="">
      <destination>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </destination>
    </destinations>
    <services>
      <service>
        <destinationPort></destinationPort>
        <protocol></protocol>
        <subProtocol></subProtocol>
      </service>
    </services>
  </rule>
  <rule disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
  </rule>
</section>
Secured by basic

dfwL3SectionId /{sectionId} get put delete

L3 Firewall Operations on specific section specified by section ID

get

Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by Id

put

Updates a L3 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

delete

Deletes a L3 section and its content by ID

get dfwL3SectionId /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}

Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by Id

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • sectionId: required (string)

    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

Secured by basic

put dfwL3SectionId /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}

Updates a L3 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • sectionId: required (string)

    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

Headers

  • If-match: required (string)

    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Body

Type: application/xml

Example:

<section id="" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
  <rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
      <appliedTo>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sectionId></sectionId>
    <sources excluded="">
      <source>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </source>
    </sources>
    <services>
      <service>
        <destinationPort></destinationPort>
        <protocol></protocol>
        <subProtocol></subProtocol>
      </service>
    </services>
  </rule>
</section>
Secured by basic

delete dfwL3SectionId /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}

Deletes a L3 section and its content by ID

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • sectionId: required (string)

    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

Secured by basic

dfwL3Rules /rules post

Operations to add one or more L3 Rules

post

Add a L3 Rule

post dfwL3Rules /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}/rules

Add a L3 Rule

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • sectionId: required (string)

    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

Headers

  • If-match: required (string)

    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="rule">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="notes"/>
        <xs:element name="appliedToList">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="appliedTo">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="sources">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="source">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="excluded"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="destinations">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="destination">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="excluded"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="services">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="service">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<rule disabled="" logged="">
  <name></name>
  <action></action>
  <notes></notes>
  <appliedToList>
    <appliedTo>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
    </appliedTo>
  </appliedToList>
  <sources excluded="">
    <source>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </source>
  </sources>
  <destinations excluded="">
    <destination>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </destination>
  </destinations>
  <services>
    <service>
      <value></value>
    </service>
  </services>
</rule>
Secured by basic

dfwL3Rule /{ruleId} get put delete

Operations on L3 rules in sections identified by section Id and Rule Id

get

Read the configuration of a specific rule identified by rule Id

put

Updates a L3 DFW Rule. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

delete

Delete a specific rule identified by rule Id

get dfwL3Rule /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}/rules/{ruleId}

Read the configuration of a specific rule identified by rule Id

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • sectionId: required (string)

    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

  • ruleId: required (string)

    The ID of the rule beeing read, updated or deleted

Secured by basic

put dfwL3Rule /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}/rules/{ruleId}

Updates a L3 DFW Rule. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • sectionId: required (string)

    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

  • ruleId: required (string)

    The ID of the rule beeing read, updated or deleted

Headers

  • If-match: required (string)

    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Body

Type: application/xml

Example:

<rule disabled="" logged="">
  <name></name>
  <action></action>
  <notes></notes>
  <appliedToList>
    <appliedTo>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sources excluded="">
    <source>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </source>
  </sources>
  <destinations excluded="">
    <destination>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </destination>
  </destinations>
  <services>
    <service>
      <value></value>
    </service>
  </services>
</rule>
Secured by basic

delete dfwL3Rule /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionId}/rules/{ruleId}

Delete a specific rule identified by rule Id

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • sectionId: required (string)

    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

  • ruleId: required (string)

    The ID of the rule beeing read, updated or deleted

Headers

  • If-match: required (string)

    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Secured by basic

dfwL3SectionName /{sectionName} put

L3 Firewall Update Operations on specific section specified by section Name

put

Updates a L3 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

put dfwL3SectionName /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3sections/{sectionName}

Updates a L3 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • sectionName: required (string)

Headers

  • If-match: required (string)

    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Body

Type: application/xml

Example:

<section id="" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
  <rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
      <appliedTo>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sectionId></sectionId>
    <sources excluded="">
      <source>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </source>
    </sources>
    <services>
      <service>
        <destinationPort></destinationPort>
        <protocol></protocol>
        <subProtocol></subProtocol>
      </service>
    </services>
  </rule>
</section>
Secured by basic

dfwL2Section /layer2sections get post

L2 Firewall Operations on specific section specified by name (in a query Parameter)

get

Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by name

post

Creates a new L2 Firewall Section with a number of rules

get dfwL2Section /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections

Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by name

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Query Parameters

  • name: (string)

    Name of the Section to read

Secured by basic

post dfwL2Section /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections

Creates a new L2 Firewall Section with a number of rules

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="section">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="rule" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0">
          <xs:complexType mixed="true">
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
              <xs:element name="appliedToList" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="appliedTo">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="sources" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="source">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                  <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="excluded"/>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="destinations" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="destination">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                  <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="excluded"/>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="services" minOccurs="0">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="service">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="destinationPort"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subProtocol"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled" use="optional"/>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged" use="optional"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="managedBy"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="type"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<section name="" managedBy="" type="">
  <rule disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
      <appliedTo>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sources excluded="">
      <source>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </source>
    </sources>
    <destinations excluded="">
      <destination>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </destination>
    </destinations>
    <services>
      <service>
        <destinationPort></destinationPort>
        <protocol></protocol>
        <subProtocol></subProtocol>
      </service>
    </services>
  </rule>
</section>
Secured by basic

dfwL2SectionId /{sectionId} get put delete

L2 Firewall Operations on specific section specified by section ID

get

Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by Id

put

Updates a L2 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

delete

Deletes a L2 section and its content by ID

get dfwL2SectionId /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}

Read a specific section of the DFW config specified by Id

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • sectionId: required (string)

    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

Secured by basic

put dfwL2SectionId /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}

Updates a L2 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • sectionId: required (string)

    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

Headers

  • If-match: required (string)

    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Body

Type: application/xml

Example:

<section id="" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
  <rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
      <appliedTo>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sectionId></sectionId>
    <sources excluded="">
      <source>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </source>
    </sources>
    <services>
      <service>
        <destinationPort></destinationPort>
        <protocol></protocol>
        <subProtocol></subProtocol>
      </service>
    </services>
  </rule>
</section>
Secured by basic

delete dfwL2SectionId /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}

Deletes a L2 section and its content by ID

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • sectionId: required (string)

    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

Secured by basic

dfwL2Rules /rules post

Operations to add one or more L2 Rules

post

Add L2 Rule

post dfwL2Rules /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}/rules

Add L2 Rule

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • sectionId: required (string)

    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

Headers

  • If-match: required (string)

    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="rule">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="notes"/>
        <xs:element name="appliedToList">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="appliedTo">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="sources">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="source">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="excluded"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="destinations">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="destination">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="excluded"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="services">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="service">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<rule disabled="" logged="">
  <name></name>
  <action></action>
  <notes></notes>
  <appliedToList>
    <appliedTo>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
    </appliedTo>
  </appliedToList>
  <sources excluded="">
    <source>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </source>
  </sources>
  <destinations excluded="">
    <destination>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </destination>
  </destinations>
  <services>
    <service>
      <value></value>
    </service>
  </services>
</rule>
Secured by basic

dfwL2Rule /{ruleId} get put delete

Operations on L2 rules in sections identified by section Id and Rule Id

get

Read the configuration of a specific rule identified by rule Id

put

Updates a L2 DFW Rule. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

delete

Delete a specific rule identified by rule Id

get dfwL2Rule /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}/rules/{ruleId}

Read the configuration of a specific rule identified by rule Id

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • sectionId: required (string)

    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

  • ruleId: required (string)

    The ID of the rule beeing read, updated or deleted

Secured by basic

put dfwL2Rule /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}/rules/{ruleId}

Updates a L2 DFW Rule. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • sectionId: required (string)

    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

  • ruleId: required (string)

    The ID of the rule beeing read, updated or deleted

Headers

  • If-match: required (string)

    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Body

Type: application/xml

Example:

<rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
  <name></name>
  <action></action>
  <notes></notes>
  <sources excluded="">
    <source>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </source>
  </sources>
  <destinations excluded="">
    <destination>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </destination>
  </destinations>
  <services>
    <service>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </service>
  </services>
  <appliedToList>
    <appliedTo>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </appliedTo>
  </appliedToList>
</rule>
Secured by basic

delete dfwL2Rule /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionId}/rules/{ruleId}

Delete a specific rule identified by rule Id

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • sectionId: required (string)

    The ID of the section beeing added, updated or deleted

  • ruleId: required (string)

    The ID of the rule beeing read, updated or deleted

Headers

  • If-match: required (string)

    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Secured by basic

dfwL2SectionName /{sectionName} put

L3 Firewall Update Operations on specific section specified by section Name

put

Updates a L2 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

put dfwL2SectionName /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer2sections/{sectionName}

Updates a L2 DFW Section. To do this you need to read it first, make your changes, and then update the section by supplying the Etag value received in the read in the If-Match header

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • sectionName: required (string)

Headers

  • If-match: required (string)

    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Body

Type: application/xml

Example:

<section id="" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
  <rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
      <appliedTo>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sectionId></sectionId>
    <sources excluded="">
      <source>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </source>
    </sources>
    <services>
      <service>
        <destinationPort></destinationPort>
        <protocol></protocol>
        <subProtocol></subProtocol>
      </service>
    </services>
  </rule>
</section>
Secured by basic

layer3RedirectSections /layer3redirectsections post

Layer3 redirect sections and rules

post

Add L3 redirect section

post layer3RedirectSections /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections

Add L3 redirect section

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="section">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
        <xs:element name="appliedToList">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="appliedTo">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sectionId"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<section>
  <name></name>
  <action></action>
  <appliedToList>
    <appliedTo>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </appliedTo>
  </appliedToList>
  <sectionId></sectionId>
</section>
Secured by basic

section /{section} get put delete

Layer3 redirect section

get

Get L3 redirect section configuration

put

Modify L3 Redirect section. You will need to get the Etag value out of the GET first. Then pass the modified version of the whole redirect section configuration in the GET body

delete

Delete specified L3 redirect section

get section /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}

Get L3 redirect section configuration

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • section: required (string)

    Specify section by ID or name

Secured by basic

put section /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}

Modify L3 Redirect section. You will need to get the Etag value out of the GET first. Then pass the modified version of the whole redirect section configuration in the GET body

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • section: required (string)

    Specify section by ID or name

Headers

  • if-match: required (string)

    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="section">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="rule">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
              <xs:element name="appliedToList">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="appliedTo">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sectionId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="generationNumber"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="timestamp"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<section id="" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
  <rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
    <name></name>
    <action></action>
    <appliedToList>
      <appliedTo>
        <name></name>
        <value></value>
        <type></type>
        <isValid></isValid>
      </appliedTo>
    </appliedToList>
    <sectionId></sectionId>
  </rule>
</section>
Secured by basic

delete section /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}

Delete specified L3 redirect section

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • section: required (string)

    Specify section by ID or name

Secured by basic

rules /rules post

L3 redirect rules for specified section

post

Add L3 redirect rule

post rules /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}/rules

Add L3 redirect rule

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • section: required (string)

    Specify section by ID or name

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="section">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
        <xs:element name="appliedToList">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="appliedTo">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sectionId"/>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="generationNumber"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="timestamp"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<section id="" name="" generationNumber="" timestamp="">
  <name></name>
  <action></action>
  <appliedToList>
    <appliedTo>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </appliedTo>
  </appliedToList>
  <sectionId></sectionId>
</section>
Secured by basic

rule /{ruleID} get put delete

Rule for specified section

get

Get L3 redirect rule

put

Modify L3 redirect rule. You will need Etag value from the response header of GET call. Then, pass Etag value as the if-match header in PUT call

delete

Delete specified L3 redirect rule

get rule /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}/rules/{ruleID}

Get L3 redirect rule

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • section: required (string)

    Specify section by ID or name

  • ruleID: required (string)

    Specified redirect rule

Secured by basic

put rule /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}/rules/{ruleID}

Modify L3 redirect rule. You will need Etag value from the response header of GET call. Then, pass Etag value as the if-match header in PUT call

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • section: required (string)

    Specify section by ID or name

  • ruleID: required (string)

    Specified redirect rule

Headers

  • if-match: required (string)

    Needed value that you will receive in the reponse of the read (GET) method in the Etag header

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="rule">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
        <xs:element name="appliedToList">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="appliedTo">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isValid"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<rule id="" disabled="" logged="">
  <name></name>
  <action></action>
  <appliedToList>
    <appliedTo>
      <name></name>
      <value></value>
      <type></type>
      <isValid></isValid>
    </appliedTo>
  </appliedToList>
</rule>
Secured by basic

delete rule /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/config/layer3redirectsections/{section}/rules/{ruleID}

Delete specified L3 redirect rule

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • section: required (string)

    Specify section by ID or name

  • ruleID: required (string)

    Specified redirect rule

Secured by basic

dfwDrafts /globalroot-0/drafts post get

Import and export firewall configurations

post

Save a firewall configuration

get

Displays the draft IDs of all saved configurations

post dfwDrafts /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts

Save a firewall configuration

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="firewallDraft">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="preserve"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mode"/>
        <xs:element name="config">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="contextId"/>
              <xs:element name="layer3Sections">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="section">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="precedence"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="layer2Sections">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="section">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="precedence"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<firewallDraft name="">
  <description></description>
  <preserve></preserve>
  <mode></mode>
  <config>
    <contextId></contextId>
    <layer3Sections>
      <section name="" >
        <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
          <name></name>
          <action></action>
          <precedence></precedence>
        </rule>
      </section>
    </layer3Sections>
    <layer2Sections>
      <section name="">
        <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
          <name></name>
          <action></action>
          <precedence></precedence>
        </rule>
      </section>
    </layer2Sections>
  </config>
</firewallDraft>
Secured by basic

Secured by basic
  • Security
Secured by basic

put dfwDraft /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts/{draftID}

Update a saved firewall configuration

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • draftID: required (string)

    Specified draft ID (retrieved through dfwDrafts GET call)

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="firewallDraft">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="preserve"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mode"/>
        <xs:element name="config">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="contextId"/>
              <xs:element name="layer3Sections">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="section">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="precedence"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="layer2Sections">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="section">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="precedence"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<firewallDraft name="">
  <description></description>
  <preserve></preserve>
  <mode></mode>
  <config>
    <contextId></contextId>
    <layer3Sections>
      <section name="" >
        <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
          <name></name>
          <action></action>
          <precedence></precedence>
        </rule>
      </section>
    </layer3Sections>
    <layer2Sections>
      <section name="">
        <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
          <name></name>
          <action></action>
          <precedence></precedence>
        </rule>
      </section>
    </layer2Sections>
  </config>
</firewallDraft>

dfwConfigImport /action/import post

Import a configuration

post

Import a configuration

post dfwConfigImport /4.0/firewall/globalroot-0/drafts/{draftID}/action/import

Import a configuration

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • draftID: required (string)

    Specified draft ID (retrieved through dfwDrafts GET call)

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="firewallDraft">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="preserve"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="user"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mode"/>
        <xs:element name="config">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="contextId"/>
              <xs:element name="layer3Sections">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="section">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="precedence"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="timestamp"/>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="layer2Sections">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="section">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="precedence"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="disabled"/>
                              <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="timestamp"/>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="generationNumber"/>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="timestamp"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="id"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
      <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="timestamp"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<firewallDraft id="" name="" timestamp="">
  <description></description>
  <preserve></preserve>
  <user></user>
  <mode></mode>
  <config timestamp="">
    <contextId></contextId>
    <layer3Sections>
      <section name="" timestamp="">
        <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
          <name></name>
          <action></action>
          <precedence></precedence>
        </rule>
      </section>
    </layer3Sections>
    <layer2Sections>
      <section name="" timestamp="">
        <rule id="" disabled="true|false" logged="true|false">
          <name></name>
          <action></action>
          <precedence></precedence>
        </rule>
      </section>
    </layer2Sections>
    <generationNumber></generationNumber>
  </config>
</firewallDraft>
Secured by basic

Secured by basic
  • Security
Secured by basic

put dfwThresholds /4.0/firewall/stats/eventthresholds

Configure thresholds

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="eventThresholds">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="cpu">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="percentValue"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="memory">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="percentValue"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="connectionsPerSecond">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<eventThresholds>
  <cpu>
    <percentValue></percentValue>
  </cpu>
  <memory>
    <percentValue></percentValue>
  </memory>
  <connectionsPerSecond>
    <value></value>
  </connectionsPerSecond>
</eventThresholds>

get dfwIPFix /4.0/firewall/{contextId}/config/ipfix

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • contextId: required (string)

    Specified context

Secured by basic

put dfwIPFix /4.0/firewall/{contextId}/config/ipfix

Configure IPFix

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • contextId: required (string)

    Specified context

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="ipfixConfiguration">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="contextId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipfixEnabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="observationDomainId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="flowTimeout"/>
        <xs:element name="collector">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ip"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<ipfixConfiguration>
  <contextId></contextId>
  <ipfixEnabled></ipfixEnabled>
  <observationDomainId></observationDomainId>
  <flowTimeout></flowTimeout>
  <collector>
    <ip></ip>
    <port></port>
  </collector>
</ipfixConfiguration>

Secured by basic

spoofGuardPolicies

SpoofGuard policies

spoofGuardPolicies /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies post get

post

Create a SpoofGuard policy to specify the operation mode for networks.

get

Retrieve all SpoofGuard policies

post spoofGuardPolicies /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies

Create a SpoofGuard policy to specify the operation mode for networks.

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="spoofguardPolicy">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="operationMode"/>
        <xs:element name="enforcementPoint">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="allowLocalIPs"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<spoofguardPolicy>
  <name></name>
  <description></description>
  <operationMode></operationMode>
  <enforcementPoint>
    <id></id>
    <name></name>
    <type></type>
  </enforcementPoint>
  <allowLocalIPs></allowLocalIPs>
</spoofguardPolicy>
Secured by basic

get spoofGuardPolicies /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies

Retrieve all SpoofGuard policies

Secured by basic
  • Security
Secured by basic

spoofGuardPolicy /{policyID} post get put delete

Specified policy

post

Use query parameters to perform operations on a policy

get

Retrieve policy information, or use the query parameters to perform operations

put

Modify SpoofGuard policy

delete

Delete a policy

post spoofGuardPolicy /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies/{policyID}

Use query parameters to perform operations on a policy

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • policyID: required (string)

Query Parameters

  • action: required (string)

    Set to "approve" along with specified IP addresses in body to approve them, or set to "publish" to publish the approved IP addresses

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="spoofguardList">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="spoofguard">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicUuid"/>
              <xs:element name="approvedIpAddress">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="approvedMacAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="approvedBy"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="approvedOn"/>
              <xs:element name="publishedIpAddress">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="publishedMacAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="publishedBy"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="publishedOn"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<spoofguardList>
  <spoofguard>
    <id></id>
    <vnicUuid></vnicUuid>
    <approvedIpAddress>
      <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    </approvedIpAddress>
    <approvedMacAddress></approvedMacAddress>
    <approvedBy></approvedBy>
    <approvedOn></approvedOn>
    <publishedIpAddress>
      <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    </publishedIpAddress>
    <publishedMacAddress></publishedMacAddress>
    <publishedBy></publishedBy>
    <publishedOn></publishedOn>
  </spoofguard>
</spoofguardList>
Secured by basic

get spoofGuardPolicy /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies/{policyID}

Retrieve policy information, or use the query parameters to perform operations

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • policyID: required (string)

Query Parameters

  • list: (string)

    Use to retrieve IP addresses for specified state (ACTIVE|INACTIVE|PUBLISHED|UNPUBLISHED|REVIEW_PENDING|DUPLICATE)

Secured by basic

put spoofGuardPolicy /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies/{policyID}

Modify SpoofGuard policy

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • policyID: required (string)

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="spoofguardPolicy">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="policyId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="operationMode"/>
        <xs:element name="enforcementPoint">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="allowLocalIPs"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<spoofguardPolicy>
  <policyId></policyId>
  <name></name>
  <description></description>
  <operationMode></operationMode>
  <enforcementPoint>
    <id></id>
    <name></name>
    <type></type>
  </enforcementPoint>
  <allowLocalIPs></allowLocalIPs>
</spoofguardPolicy>
Secured by basic

delete spoofGuardPolicy /4.0/services/spoofguard/policies/{policyID}

Delete a policy

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • policyID: required (string)
Secured by basic

flowMonitoring

Operations on flowdata

flowStats /flowstats get

Retrieve flow statistics for a datacenter, port group, VM, or vNIC

get

Retrieve flow statistics for a datacenter, port group, VM, or vNIC

get flowStats /2.1/app/flow/flowstats

Retrieve flow statistics for a datacenter, port group, VM, or vNIC

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Query Parameters

  • contextId: (string)

    vc-moref-id of the datacenter, portgroup, vm, or UUID of the vNIC for which traffic flow is to be retrieved

  • flowType: (string)

    Type of flow to be retrieved (TCP_UDP|LAYER2|LAYER3)

  • startTime: (string)

    Flows with start time greater than specified time are retrieved

  • endTime: (string)

    Flows with start time lower than specified time are retrieved

  • startIndex: (integer - default: 0)

    (optional) Specifies starting point for retrieval. If not specified, start from the beginning by default

  • pageSize: (integer - default: 256)

    (optional) Limit the max number of entries returned. Valid range is 1-1024

Secured by basic

flowStatsInfo /info get

Flow statistics info

get

Retrieve flow statistics info

get flowStatsInfo /2.1/app/flow/flowstats/info

Retrieve flow statistics info

Secured by basic
  • Security
Secured by basic

flowConfig /config get put

Configure flow Monitoring

get

Retrieve flow details

put

Update specified flows

get flowConfig /2.1/app/flow/config

Retrieve flow details

Secured by basic
  • Security
Secured by basic

put flowConfig /2.1/app/flow/config

Update specified flows

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="FlowConfiguration">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="collectFlows"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ignoreBlockedFlows"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ignoreLayer2Flows"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sourceIPs"/>
        <xs:element name="sourceContainer">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="destinationIPs"/>
        <xs:element name="destinationContainer">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="destinationPorts"/>
        <xs:element name="service">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<FlowConfiguration>
  <collectFlows></collectFlows>
  <ignoreBlockedFlows></ignoreBlockedFlows>
  <ignoreLayer2Flows></ignoreLayer2Flows>
  <sourceIPs></sourceIPs>
  <sourceContainer>
    <name></name>
    <id></id>
    <type></type>
  </sourceContainer>
  <destinationIPs></destinationIPs>
  <destinationContainer>
    <name></name>
    <id></id>
    <type></type>
  </destinationContainer>
  <destinationPorts></destinationPorts>
  <service>
    <name></name>
    <id></id>
  </service>
</FlowConfiguration>
Secured by basic

flowContext /{contextId} delete

delete

Delete flow records for context by contextId

delete flowContext /2.1/app/flow/{contextId}

Delete flow records for context by contextId

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • contextId: required (string)
Secured by basic
