Secured by basic

nsxEdges

Installed NSX Edges in your inventory

nsxEdges /4.0/edges post get

post

Install NSX Edge services gateway or logical router, depending on request body

get

Retrieve a list of NSX Edges in your inventory or use the query parameters to filter results by datacenter or port group

post nsxEdges /4.0/edges

Install NSX Edge services gateway or logical router, depending on request body

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Query Parameters

  • isUniversal: (boolean)

    Set to "true" when creating a universal logical router. Note the

    in the request body must be "DISTRIBUTED_ROUTER"

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="edge">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="datacenterMoid"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tenant"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="fqdn"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vseLogLevel"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableAesni"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableFips"/>
        <xs:element name="appliances">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applianceSize"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableCoreDump"/>
              <xs:element name="appliance">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="resourcePoolId"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="datastoreId"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hostId"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vmFolderId"/>
                    <xs:element name="customField">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="key"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="cpuReservation">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="limit"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="reservation"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="shares"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="memoryReservation">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="limit"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="reservation"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="shares"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="vnics">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="vnic">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="index"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="portgroupId"/>
                    <xs:element name="addressGroups">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="addressGroup">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryAddress"/>
                                <xs:element name="secondaryAddresses">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subnetMask"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="macAddress">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="edgeVmHaIndex"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="fenceParameter">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="key"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableProxyArp"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableSendRedirects"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isConnected"/>
                    <xs:element name="inShapingPolicy">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="averageBandwidth"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="peakBandwidth"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="burstSize"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="inherited"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="outShapingPolicy">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="averageBandwidth"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="peakBandwidth"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="burstSize"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="inherited"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="cliSettings">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="userName"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="remoteAccess"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="autoConfiguration">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="rulePriority"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="dnsClient">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryDns"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secondaryDns"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainName"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="queryDaemon">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<edge>
  <datacenterMoid></datacenterMoid>
  <name></name>
  <type></type>
  <description></description>
  <tenant></tenant>
  <fqdn></fqdn>
  <vseLogLevel></vseLogLevel>
  <enableAesni></enableAesni>
  <enableFips></enableFips>
  <appliances>
    <applianceSize></applianceSize>
    <enableCoreDump></enableCoreDump>
    <appliance>
      <resourcePoolId></resourcePoolId>
      <datastoreId></datastoreId>
      <hostId></hostId>
      <vmFolderId></vmFolderId>
      <customField>
        <key></key>
        <value></value>
      </customField>
      <cpuReservation>
        <limit></limit>
        <reservation></reservation>
        <shares></shares>
      </cpuReservation>
      <memoryReservation>
        <limit></limit>
        <reservation></reservation>
        <shares></shares>
      </memoryReservation>
    </appliance>
  </appliances>
  <vnics>
    <vnic>
      <index></index>
      <name></name>
      <type></type>
      <portgroupId></portgroupId>
      <addressGroups>
        <addressGroup>
          <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
          <secondaryAddresses>
            <ipAddress></ipAddress>
          </secondaryAddresses>
          <subnetMask></subnetMask>
        </addressGroup>
      </addressGroups>
      <macAddress>
        <edgeVmHaIndex></edgeVmHaIndex>
        <value></value>
      </macAddress>
      <fenceParameter>
        <key></key>
        <value></value>
      </fenceParameter>
      <mtu></mtu>
      <enableProxyArp></enableProxyArp>
      <enableSendRedirects></enableSendRedirects>
      <isConnected></isConnected>
      <inShapingPolicy>
        <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
        <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
        <burstSize></burstSize>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <inherited></inherited>
      </inShapingPolicy>
      <outShapingPolicy>
        <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
        <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
        <burstSize></burstSize>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <inherited></inherited>
      </outShapingPolicy>
    </vnic>
  </vnics>
  <cliSettings>
    <userName></userName>
    <password></password>
    <remoteAccess></remoteAccess>
  </cliSettings>
  <autoConfiguration>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <rulePriority></rulePriority>
  </autoConfiguration>
  <dnsClient>
    <primaryDns></primaryDns>
    <secondaryDns></secondaryDns>
    <domainName></domainName>
  </dnsClient>
  <queryDaemon>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <port></port>
  </queryDaemon>
</edge>
Secured by basic

get nsxEdges /4.0/edges

Retrieve a list of NSX Edges in your inventory or use the query parameters to filter results by datacenter or port group

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Query Parameters

  • datacenter: (string)

    Retrieve Edges by datacenter MoId

  • tenant: (string)

    Retrieve Edges on specified tenant (by tenant ID)

  • pg: (string)

    Retrieve Edges with one interface on specified port group (by port group MoId)

Secured by basic

nsxEdge /{edgeId} post get put delete

NSX Edge operations

post

Manage NSX Edge

get

Retrieve Edge details

put

Update the NSX Edge configuration

delete

Delete specified Edge from database. Associated appliances are also deleted

post nsxEdge /4.0/edges/{edgeId}

Manage NSX Edge

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Query Parameters

  • action: required (string)

    Options include "forcesync" (resync Edge vm's), "redeploy" ()

Secured by basic

get nsxEdge /4.0/edges/{edgeId}

Retrieve Edge details

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Query Parameters

  • isUniversal: (boolean)

    Filter read of Edges to display only universal logical routers

Secured by basic

put nsxEdge /4.0/edges/{edgeId}

Update the NSX Edge configuration

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="edge">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="datacenterMoid"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="fqdn"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableAesni"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableFips"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vseLogLevel"/>
        <xs:element name="vnics">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="vnic">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="index"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="portgroupId"/>
                    <xs:element name="addressGroups">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="addressGroup">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryAddress"/>
                                <xs:element name="secondaryAddresses">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subnetMask"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableProxyArp"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableSendRedirects"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isConnected"/>
                    <xs:element name="inShapingPolicy">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="averageBandwidth"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="peakBandwidth"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="burstSize"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="inherited"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="outShapingPolicy">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="averageBandwidth"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="peakBandwidth"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="burstSize"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="inherited"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="appliances">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applianceSize"/>
              <xs:element name="appliance">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="resourcePoolId"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="datastoreId"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vmFolderId"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="cliSettings">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="remoteAccess"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="userName"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="features">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="firewall">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="defaultPolicy">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="rules">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleTag"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleType"/>
                                <xs:element name="source">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="exclude"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="destination"/>
                                <xs:element name="application">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationId"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="matchTranslated"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="routing">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="staticRouting">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="defaultRoute">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="gatewayAddress"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element name="staticRoutes">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element name="route">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="network"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="nextHop"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="ospf">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="highAvailability">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="declareDeadTime"/>
                    <xs:element name="logging">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enable"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logLevel"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="syslog">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
                    <xs:element name="serverAddresses">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ipsec">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element name="logging">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enable"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logLevel"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="sites">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="site">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="localId"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="localIp"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="peerId"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="encryptionAlgorithm"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enablePfs"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="dhGroup"/>
                                <xs:element name="localSubnets">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subnet"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element name="peerSubnets">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subnet"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="psk"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="authenticationMode"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="global">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="caCertificates"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="crlCertificates"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="dhcp">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element name="staticBindings">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="staticBinding">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="autoConfigureDNS"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bindingId"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vmId"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicId"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hostname"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultGateway"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="leaseTime"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="ipPools">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="ipPool">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="autoConfigureDNS"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="poolId"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipRange"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultGateway"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="leaseTime"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="logging">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enable"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logLevel"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="nat">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="natRules">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="natRule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleId"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleTag"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleType"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalAddress"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedAddress"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalPort"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedPort"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="autoConfiguration">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="rulePriority"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<edge>
  <id></id>
  <description></description>
  <datacenterMoid></datacenterMoid>
  <name></name>
  <type></type>
  <fqdn></fqdn>
  <enableAesni></enableAesni>
  <enableFips></enableFips>
  <vseLogLevel></vseLogLevel>
  <vnics>
    <vnic>
      <index></index>
      <name></name>
      <type></type>
      <portgroupId></portgroupId>
      <addressGroups>
        <addressGroup>
          <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
          <secondaryAddresses>
            <ipAddress></ipAddress>
          </secondaryAddresses>
          <subnetMask></subnetMask>
        </addressGroup>
      </addressGroups>
      <mtu></mtu>
      <enableProxyArp></enableProxyArp>
      <enableSendRedirects></enableSendRedirects>
      <isConnected></isConnected>
      <inShapingPolicy>
        <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
        <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
        <burstSize></burstSize>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <inherited></inherited>
      </inShapingPolicy>
      <outShapingPolicy>
        <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
        <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
        <burstSize></burstSize>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <inherited></inherited>
      </outShapingPolicy>
    </vnic>
  </vnics>
  <appliances>
    <applianceSize></applianceSize>
    <appliance>
      <resourcePoolId></resourcePoolId>
      <datastoreId></datastoreId>
      <vmFolderId></vmFolderId>
    </appliance>
  </appliances>
  <cliSettings>
    <remoteAccess></remoteAccess>
    <userName></userName>
  </cliSettings>
  <features>
    <firewall>
      <defaultPolicy>
        <action></action>
        <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
      </defaultPolicy>
      <rules>
        <rule>
          <id></id>
          <ruleTag></ruleTag>
          <name></name>
          <ruleType></ruleType>
          <source>
            <exclude></exclude>
            <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
          </source>
          <destination></destination>
          <application>
            <applicationId></applicationId>
          </application>
          <action></action>
          <enabled></enabled>
          <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
          <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
        </rule>
      </rules>
    </firewall>
    <routing>
      <staticRouting>
        <defaultRoute>
          <vnic></vnic>
          <gatewayAddress></gatewayAddress>
          <description></description>
        </defaultRoute>
        <staticRoutes>
          <route>
            <vnic></vnic>
            <network></network>
            <nextHop></nextHop>
            <type></type>
          </route>
        </staticRoutes>
      </staticRouting>
      <ospf>
        <enabled></enabled>
      </ospf>
    </routing>
    <highAvailability>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <declareDeadTime></declareDeadTime>
      <logging>
        <enable></enable>
        <logLevel></logLevel>
      </logging>
    </highAvailability>
    <syslog>
      <protocol></protocol>
      <serverAddresses>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      </serverAddresses>
    </syslog>
    <ipsec>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <logging>
        <enable></enable>
        <logLevel></logLevel>
      </logging>
      <sites>
        <site>
          <enabled></enabled>
          <name></name>
          <localId></localId>
          <localIp></localIp>
          <peerId></peerId>
          <encryptionAlgorithm></encryptionAlgorithm>
          <mtu></mtu>
          <enablePfs></enablePfs>
          <dhGroup></dhGroup>
          <localSubnets>
            <subnet></subnet>
          </localSubnets>
          <peerSubnets>
            <subnet></subnet>
          </peerSubnets>
          <psk></psk>
          <authenticationMode></authenticationMode>
        </site>
      </sites>
      <global>
        <caCertificates/>
        <crlCertificates/>
      </global>
    </ipsec>
    <dhcp>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <staticBindings>
        <staticBinding>
          <autoConfigureDNS></autoConfigureDNS>
          <bindingId></bindingId>
          <vmId></vmId>
          <vnicId></vnicId>
          <hostname></hostname>
          <ipAddress></ipAddress>
          <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
          <leaseTime></leaseTime>
        </staticBinding>
      </staticBindings>
      <ipPools>
        <ipPool>
          <autoConfigureDNS></autoConfigureDNS>
          <poolId></poolId>
          <ipRange></ipRange>
          <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
          <leaseTime></leaseTime>
        </ipPool>
      </ipPools>
      <logging>
        <enable></enable>
        <logLevel></logLevel>
      </logging>
    </dhcp>
    <nat>
      <natRules>
        <natRule>
          <ruleId></ruleId>
          <ruleTag></ruleTag>
          <ruleType></ruleType>
          <action></action>
          <vnic></vnic>
          <originalAddress></originalAddress>
          <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
          <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
          <enabled></enabled>
          <protocol></protocol>
          <originalPort></originalPort>
          <translatedPort></translatedPort>
        </natRule>
      </natRules>
    </nat>
  </features>
  <autoConfiguration>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <rulePriority></rulePriority>
  </autoConfiguration>
</edge>
Secured by basic

delete nsxEdge /4.0/edges/{edgeId}

Delete specified Edge from database. Associated appliances are also deleted

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

dns /dnsclient put

DNS settings (primary/secondary and search domain) of an Edge

put

Update Edge DNS settings

put dns /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dnsclient

Update Edge DNS settings

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="dnsClient">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryDns"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secondaryDns"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainName"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<dnsClient>
  <primaryDns></primaryDns>
  <secondaryDns></secondaryDns>
  <domainName></domainName>
</dnsClient>
Secured by basic

aesni /aesni post

AESNI Setting

post

Modify AESNI setting

post aesni /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/aesni

Modify AESNI setting

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Query Parameters

  • enable: required (boolean)
Secured by basic

coreDump /coredump post

Enabling core-dump feature results in deployment of inbuilt extra disk to save core-dump files. 1GB for compact edge and 8GB for other types. Disabling detaches the disk

post

Modify core dump setting

post coreDump /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/coredump

Modify core dump setting

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

summary /summary get

Edge summary

get

Retrieve details about the specified Edge

get summary /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/summary

Retrieve details about the specified Edge

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

status /status get

Edge status

get

Retrieve the status of the specified Edge

get status /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/status

Retrieve the status of the specified Edge

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Query Parameters

  • getlatest: (boolean)

    true = fetch the status live from NSX Edge, false = fetch the latest available status from database

  • detailed: (boolean)

    true = fetch detailed status per feature, false = aggregated summary of status per feature

  • preRulesStatus: (boolean)

    true = fetch detailed output for pre rules in addition to the regular output

Secured by basic

techSupportLogs /techsupportlogs get

Tech support logs for specified Edge

get

Retrieve the tech support logs for Edge

get techSupportLogs /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/techsupportlogs

Retrieve the tech support logs for Edge

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

cliSettings /clisettings put

Manage CLI credentials and access

put

Modify CLI credentials and enable/disable SSH for Edge

put cliSettings /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/clisettings

Modify CLI credentials and enable/disable SSH for Edge

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="cliSettings">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="userName"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="remoteAccess"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="passwordExpiry"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sshLoginBannerText"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<cliSettings>
  <userName></userName>
  <password></password>
  <remoteAccess></remoteAccess>
  <passwordExpiry></passwordExpiry>
  <sshLoginBannerText></sshLoginBannerText>
</cliSettings>
Secured by basic

cliRemote /cliremoteaccess post

Enable or disable SSH on the Edge

post

post cliRemote /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/cliremoteaccess

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Query Parameters

  • enable: required (boolean)
Secured by basic

nsxEdgeFirewallConfig /firewall/config get put delete

Configure firewall for an Edge

get

Read the firewall configuration

put

Configure firewall for an Edge

delete

Delete firewall configuration

get nsxEdgeFirewallConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config

Read the firewall configuration

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put nsxEdgeFirewallConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config

Configure firewall for an Edge

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="firewall">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="defaultPolicy">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element name="globalConfig">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpPickOngoingConnections"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="dropInvalidTraffic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logInvalidTraffic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutOpen"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutEstablished"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutClose"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="udpTimeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmpTimeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmp6Timeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipGenericTimeout"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="rules">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="rule">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleTag"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element name="source">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="destination">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0">
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                        </xs:choice>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="application">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationId"/>
                          <xs:element name="service">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sourcePort"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="matchTranslated"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<firewall>
  <defaultPolicy>
    <action></action>
    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
  </defaultPolicy>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <globalConfig>
    <tcpPickOngoingConnections></tcpPickOngoingConnections>
    <tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets></tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets>
    <tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts></tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts>
    <dropInvalidTraffic></dropInvalidTraffic>
    <logInvalidTraffic></logInvalidTraffic>
    <tcpTimeoutOpen></tcpTimeoutOpen>
    <tcpTimeoutEstablished></tcpTimeoutEstablished>
    <tcpTimeoutClose></tcpTimeoutClose>
    <udpTimeout></udpTimeout>
    <icmpTimeout></icmpTimeout>
    <icmp6Timeout></icmp6Timeout>
    <ipGenericTimeout></ipGenericTimeout>
  </globalConfig>
  <rules>
    <rule>
      <ruleTag></ruleTag>
      <name></name>
      <source>
        <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      </source>
      <destination>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      </destination>
      <application>
        <applicationId></applicationId>
        <service>
          <protocol></protocol>
          <port></port>
          <sourcePort></sourcePort>
        </service>
      </application>
      <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
      <direction></direction>
      <action></action>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
      <description></description>
    </rule>
  </rules>
</firewall>
Secured by basic

delete nsxEdgeFirewallConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config

Delete firewall configuration

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

firewallRules /rules post

Firewall rules

post

Add one or more rules. You can add a rule above a specific rule using the query parameter, indicating the desired ruleID.

post firewallRules /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules

Add one or more rules. You can add a rule above a specific rule using the query parameter, indicating the desired ruleID.

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Query Parameters

  • aboveRuleId: (string)

    rule Id

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="firewall">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="defaultPolicy">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="globalConfig">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpPickOngoingConnections"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="dropInvalidTraffic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logInvalidTraffic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutOpen"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutEstablished"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutClose"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="udpTimeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmpTimeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmp6Timeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipGenericTimeout"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="rules">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="rule">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleTag"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element name="source">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="destination">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0">
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                        </xs:choice>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="application">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationId"/>
                          <xs:element name="service">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sourcePort"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="matchTranslated"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<firewall>
  <defaultPolicy>
    <action></action>
    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
  </defaultPolicy>
  <globalConfig>
    <tcpPickOngoingConnections></tcpPickOngoingConnections>
    <tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets></tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets>
    <tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts></tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts>
    <dropInvalidTraffic></dropInvalidTraffic>
    <logInvalidTraffic></logInvalidTraffic>
    <tcpTimeoutOpen></tcpTimeoutOpen>
    <tcpTimeoutEstablished></tcpTimeoutEstablished>
    <tcpTimeoutClose></tcpTimeoutClose>
    <udpTimeout></udpTimeout>
    <icmpTimeout></icmpTimeout>
    <icmp6Timeout></icmp6Timeout>
    <ipGenericTimeout></ipGenericTimeout>
  </globalConfig>
  <rules>
    <rule>
      <ruleTag></ruleTag>
      <name></name>
      <source>
        <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      </source>
      <destination>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
        <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      </destination>
      <application>
        <applicationId></applicationId>
        <service>
          <protocol></protocol>
          <port></port>
          <sourcePort></sourcePort>
        </service>
      </application>
      <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
      <direction></direction>
      <action></action>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
      <description></description>
    </rule>
  </rules>
</firewall>
Secured by basic

firewallRule /{ruleId} get put delete

Specific firewall rule

get

Retrieve specific rule

put

Modify a specific firewall rule

delete

Delete firewall rule

get firewallRule /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules/{ruleId}

Retrieve specific rule

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

  • ruleId: required (string)

    Rule ID

Secured by basic

put firewallRule /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules/{ruleId}

Modify a specific firewall rule

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

  • ruleId: required (string)

    Rule ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="rule">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleTag"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element name="source">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="destination">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicGroupId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="application">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="matchTranslated"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<rule>
  <ruleTag></ruleTag>
  <name></name>
  <source>
    <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
    <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
  </source>
  <destination>
    <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
    <vnicGroupId></vnicGroupId>
  </destination>
  <application>
    <applicationId></applicationId>
  </application>
  <matchTranslated></matchTranslated>
  <direction></direction>
  <action></action>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
  <description></description>
</rule>
Secured by basic

delete firewallRule /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/firewall/config/rules/{ruleId}

Delete firewall rule

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

  • ruleId: required (string)

    Rule ID

Secured by basic

  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="globalConfig">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpPickOngoingConnections"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpAllowOutOfWindowPackets"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpSendResetForClosedVsePorts"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="dropInvalidTraffic"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logInvalidTraffic"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutOpen"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutEstablished"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="tcpTimeoutClose"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="udpTimeout"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmpTimeout"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="icmp6Timeout"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipGenericTimeout"/>

  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

firewallStatistics /firewall/statistics/firewall get

get

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Query Parameters

  • interval: (string)

    60 min by default, can be given as 1 -60 min, oneDay | oneWeek | oneMonth | oneYear

Secured by basic

edgeNat /nat/config put get delete

SNAT and DNAT rules for NSX Edge

put

Configure SNAT and DNAT rules for an Edge

get

Query SNAT and DNAT rules for an Edge

delete

Delete all NAT rules for an Edge

put edgeNat /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config

Configure SNAT and DNAT rules for an Edge

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="nat">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="natRules">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="natRule">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ruleTag"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedPort"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalPort"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<nat>
  <natRules>
    <natRule>
      <ruleTag></ruleTag>
      <action></action>
      <vnic></vnic>
      <originalAddress></originalAddress>
      <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
      <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <description></description>
      <protocol></protocol>
      <translatedPort></translatedPort>
      <originalPort></originalPort>
    </natRule>
  </natRules>
</nat>
Secured by basic

delete edgeNat /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config

Secured by basic

edgeNatRules /rules post

NAT rules

post

Add a NAT rule above a specific rule in the NAT rules table (using aboveRuleId) or append NAT rules to the bottom

post edgeNatRules /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config/rules

Add a NAT rule above a specific rule in the NAT rules table (using aboveRuleId) or append NAT rules to the bottom

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Query Parameters

  • aboveRuleId: (string)

    Specified rule ID. If the ID does not exist, Edge Manager displays an error

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="natRules">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="natRule">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedPort"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalPort"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<natRules>
  <natRule>
    <action></action>
    <vnic></vnic>
    <originalAddress></originalAddress>
    <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
    <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <description></description>
    <protocol></protocol>
    <translatedPort></translatedPort>
    <originalPort></originalPort>
  </natRule>
</natRules>
Secured by basic

edgeNatRule /{ruleID} put delete

Specified NAT rule

put

Modify a NAT rule

delete

Delete a NAT rule

put edgeNatRule /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/nat/config/rules/{ruleID}

Modify a NAT rule

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

  • ruleID: required (string)

    Specified rule ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="natRule">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalAddress"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedAddress"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loggingEnabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="translatedPort"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="originalPort"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<natRule>
  <action></action>
  <vnic></vnic>
  <originalAddress></originalAddress>
  <translatedAddress></translatedAddress>
  <loggingEnabled></loggingEnabled>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <description></description>
  <protocol></protocol>
  <translatedPort></translatedPort>
  <originalPort></originalPort>
</natRule>
