routingConfig /routing/config get put delete

Static and dynamic routing for each NSX Edge

get

Retrieve routes

put

Configure globalConfig, staticRouting, OSPG, BGP, and IS-IS

delete

Delete the routing config stored in the NSX Mgr database and the default routes from the specified NSX Edge appliance

get routingConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config

Retrieve routes

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put routingConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config

Configure globalConfig, staticRouting, OSPG, BGP, and IS-IS

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="routing">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="routingGlobalConfig">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ecmp"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="routerId"/>
              <xs:element name="logging">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enable"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logLevel"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ipPrefixes">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="ipPrefix">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="staticRouting">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="staticRoutes">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="route">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="network"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="nextHop"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="defaultRoute">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="gatewayAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="ospf">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultOriginate"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="gracefulRestart"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocolAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="forwardingAddress"/>
              <xs:element name="ospfAreas">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="ospfArea">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element name="authentication">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="ospfInterfaces">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="ospfInterface">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaId"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloInterval"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="deadInterval"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="priority"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cost"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="redistribution">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element name="rules">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                                <xs:element name="from">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="isis">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="systemId"/>
              <xs:element name="areaIds">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaId"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isType"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainPassword"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaPassword"/>
              <xs:element name="isisInterfaces">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="isisInterface">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="meshGroup"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloInterval"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloMultiplier"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="lspInterval"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="metric"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="priority"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="circuitType"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="redistribution">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element name="rules">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                                <xs:element name="from">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="bgp">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="localAS"/>
              <xs:element name="bgpNeighbours">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="bgpNeighbour">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="remoteAS"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="weight"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="holdDownTimer"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="keepAliveTimer"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
                          <xs:element name="bgpFilters">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element name="bgpFilter">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="network"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipPrefixGe"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipPrefixLe"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="redistribution">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                    <xs:element name="rules">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="rule">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                                <xs:element name="from">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<routing>
  <routingGlobalConfig>
    <ecmp></ecmp>
    <routerId></routerId>
    <logging>
      <enable></enable>
      <logLevel></logLevel>
    </logging>
    <ipPrefixes>
      <ipPrefix>
        <name></name>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      </ipPrefix>
    </ipPrefixes>
  </routingGlobalConfig>
  <staticRouting>
    <staticRoutes>
      <route>
        <description></description>
        <vnic></vnic>
        <network></network>
        <nextHop></nextHop>
        <mtu></mtu>
      </route>
    </staticRoutes>
    <defaultRoute>
      <description></description>
      <vnic></vnic>
      <gatewayAddress></gatewayAddress>
      <mtu></mtu>
    </defaultRoute>
  </staticRouting>
  <ospf>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <defaultOriginate></defaultOriginate>
    <gracefulRestart></gracefulRestart>
    <protocolAddress></protocolAddress>
    <forwardingAddress></forwardingAddress>
    <ospfAreas>
      <ospfArea>
        <areaId></areaId>
        <type></type>
        <authentication>
          <type></type>
          <value></value>
        </authentication>
      </ospfArea>
    </ospfAreas>
    <ospfInterfaces>
      <ospfInterface>
        <vnic></vnic>
        <areaId></areaId>
        <helloInterval></helloInterval>
        <deadInterval></deadInterval>
        <priority></priority>
        <cost></cost>
      </ospfInterface>
    </ospfInterfaces>
    <redistribution>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <rules>
        <rule>
          <prefixName></prefixName>
          <from>
            <isis></isis>
            <ospf></ospf>
            <bgp></bgp>
            <static></static>
            <connected></connected>
          </from>
          <action></action>
        </rule>
      </rules>
    </redistribution>
  </ospf>
  <isis>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <systemId></systemId>
    <areaIds>
      <areaId></areaId>
    </areaIds>
    <isType></isType>
    <domainPassword></domainPassword>
    <areaPassword></areaPassword>
    <isisInterfaces>
      <isisInterface>
        <vnic></vnic>
        <meshGroup></meshGroup>
        <helloInterval></helloInterval>
        <helloMultiplier></helloMultiplier>
        <lspInterval></lspInterval>
        <metric></metric>
        <priority></priority>
        <circuitType></circuitType>
        <password></password>
      </isisInterface>
    </isisInterfaces>
    <redistribution>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <rules>
        <rule>
          <prefixName></prefixName>
          <from>
            <isis></isis>
            <ospf></ospf>
            <bgp></bgp>
            <static></static>
            <connected></connected>
          </from>
          <action></action>
        </rule>
      </rules>
    </redistribution>
  </isis>
  <bgp>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <localAS></localAS>
    <bgpNeighbours>
      <bgpNeighbour>
        <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        <remoteAS></remoteAS>
        <weight></weight>
        <holdDownTimer></holdDownTimer>
        <keepAliveTimer></keepAliveTimer>
        <password></password>
        <bgpFilters>
          <bgpFilter>
            <direction></direction>
            <action></action>
            <network></network>
            <ipPrefixGe></ipPrefixGe>
            <ipPrefixLe></ipPrefixLe>
          </bgpFilter>
        </bgpFilters>
      </bgpNeighbour>
    </bgpNeighbours>
    <redistribution>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <rules>
        <rule>
          <prefixName></prefixName>
          <from>
            <isis></isis>
            <ospf></ospf>
            <bgp></bgp>
            <static></static>
            <connected></connected>
          </from>
          <action></action>
        </rule>
      </rules>
    </redistribution>
  </bgp>
</routing>
Secured by basic

delete routingConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config

Delete the routing config stored in the NSX Mgr database and the default routes from the specified NSX Edge appliance

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

routingGlobalConfig /global put get

Global configuration

put

Configure global route

get

Retrieve routing info from NSX Mgr database (default route settings, static route configurations)

put routingGlobalConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/global

Configure global route

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="routingGlobalConfig">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="routerId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ecmp"/>
        <xs:element name="logging">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enable"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logLevel"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="ipPrefixes">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="ipPrefix">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<routingGlobalConfig>
  <routerId></routerId>
  <ecmp></ecmp>
  <logging>
    <enable></enable>
    <logLevel></logLevel>
  </logging>
  <ipPrefixes>
    <ipPrefix>
      <name></name>
      <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    </ipPrefix>
  </ipPrefixes>
</routingGlobalConfig>
Secured by basic

routingConfigStatic /static get put delete

Static and default routes for specified Edge

get

Read static and default routes

put

Configure static and default routes

delete

Delete both static and default routing config stored in the NSX Mgr database

get routingConfigStatic /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/static

Read static and default routes

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put routingConfigStatic /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/static

Configure static and default routes

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="staticRouting">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="staticRoutes">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="route">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="network"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="nextHop"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="defaultRoute">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="gatewayAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<staticRouting>
  <staticRoutes>
    <route>
      <description></description>
      <vnic></vnic>
      <network></network>
      <nextHop></nextHop>
      <mtu></mtu>
    </route>
  </staticRoutes>
  <defaultRoute>
    <description></description>
    <vnic></vnic>
    <gatewayAddress></gatewayAddress>
    <mtu></mtu>
  </defaultRoute>
</staticRouting>
Secured by basic

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put routingOSPF /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/ospf

Configure OSPF

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="ospf">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element name="ospfAreas">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="ospfArea">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaId"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                    <xs:element name="authentication">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="ospfInterfaces">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="ospfInterface">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaId"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloInterval"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="deadInterval"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="priority"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cost"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="redistribution">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element name="rules">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="rule">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                          <xs:element name="from">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<ospf>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <ospfAreas>
    <ospfArea>
      <areaId></areaId>
      <type></type>
      <authentication>
        <type></type>
        <value></value>
      </authentication>
    </ospfArea>
  </ospfAreas>
  <ospfInterfaces>
    <ospfInterface>
      <vnic></vnic>
      <areaId></areaId>
      <helloInterval></helloInterval>
      <deadInterval></deadInterval>
      <priority></priority>
      <cost></cost>
    </ospfInterface>
  </ospfInterfaces>
  <redistribution>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <rules>
      <rule>
        <prefixName></prefixName>
        <from>
          <isis></isis>
          <ospf></ospf>
          <bgp></bgp>
          <static></static>
          <connected></connected>
        </from>
        <action></action>
      </rule>
    </rules>
  </redistribution>
</ospf>

put routingISIS /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/isis

Config ISIS

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="isis">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="systemId"/>
        <xs:element name="areaIds">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isType"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainPassword"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="areaPassword"/>
        <xs:element name="isisInterfaces">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="isisInterface">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="meshGroup"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloInterval"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="helloMultiplier"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="lspInterval"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="metric"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="priority"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="circuitType"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="redistribution">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element name="rules">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="rule">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                          <xs:element name="from">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<isis>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <systemId></systemId>
  <areaIds>
    <areaId></areaId>
  </areaIds>
  <isType></isType>
  <domainPassword></domainPassword>
  <areaPassword></areaPassword>
  <isisInterfaces>
    <isisInterface>
      <vnic></vnic>
      <meshGroup></meshGroup>
      <helloInterval></helloInterval>
      <helloMultiplier></helloMultiplier>
      <lspInterval></lspInterval>
      <metric></metric>
      <priority></priority>
      <circuitType></circuitType>
      <password></password>
    </isisInterface>
  </isisInterfaces>
  <redistribution>
    <enabled></enabled>
      <rules>
        <rule>
          <prefixName></prefixName>
            <from>
              <isis></isis>
              <ospf></ospf>
              <bgp></bgp>
              <static></static>
              <connected></connected>
            </from>
            <action></action>
          </rule>
      </rules>
  </redistribution>
</isis>

put routingBGP /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/bgp

Configure BGP

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="bgp">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="localAS"/>
        <xs:element name="bgpNeighbours">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="bgpNeighbour">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="remoteAS"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="weight"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="holdDownTimer"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="keepAliveTimer"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
                    <xs:element name="bgpFilters">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="bgpFilter">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="network"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipPrefixGe"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipPrefixLe"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="redistribution">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element name="rules">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="rule">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="prefixName"/>
                          <xs:element name="from">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isis"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ospf"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bgp"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="static"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connected"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="action"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<bgp>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <localAS></localAS>
  <bgpNeighbours>
    <bgpNeighbour>
      <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      <remoteAS></remoteAS>
      <weight></weight>
      <holdDownTimer></holdDownTimer>
      <keepAliveTimer></keepAliveTimer>
      <password></password>
      <bgpFilters>
        <bgpFilter>
          <direction></direction>
          <action></action>
          <network></network>
          <ipPrefixGe></ipPrefixGe>
          <ipPrefixLe></ipPrefixLe>
        </bgpFilter>
      </bgpFilters>
    </bgpNeighbour>
  </bgpNeighbours>
  <redistribution>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <rules>
      <rule>
        <prefixName></prefixName>
        <from>
          <isis></isis>
          <ospf></ospf>
          <bgp></bgp>
          <static></static>
          <connected></connected>
        </from>
        <action></action>
      </rule>
    </rules>
  </redistribution>
</bgp>
Secured by basic

delete routingBGP /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/routing/config/bgp

Delete BGP Routing

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

bridging /bridging/config get put delete

Working with L2 bridging

get

Retrieve bridge configuration

put

Configure a bridge

delete

get bridging /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/bridging/config

Retrieve bridge configuration

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put bridging /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/bridging/config

Configure a bridge

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="bridges">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="version"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element name="bridge">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="virtualWire"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="dvportGroup"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<bridges>
  <version></version>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <bridge>
    <name></name>
    <virtualWire></virtualWire>
    <dvportGroup></dvportGroup>
  </bridge>
</bridges>
Secured by basic

delete bridging /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/bridging/config

Delete bridges

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

loadBalancer /loadbalancer/config get put delete

NSX Edge load balancer

get

Get current load balancer config

put

Configure load balancer

delete

Delete load balancer configuration

get loadBalancer /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config

Get current load balancer config

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put loadBalancer /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config

Configure load balancer

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="loadBalancer">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableServiceInsertion"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="accelerationEnabled"/>
        <xs:element name="logging">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enable"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logLevel"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="virtualServer">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="virtualServerId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connectionLimit"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connectionRateLimit"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationProfileId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultPoolId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableServiceInsertion"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="accelerationEnabled"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="applicationProfile">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationProfileId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="insertXForwardedFor"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sslPassthrough"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="template"/>
              <xs:element name="persistence">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="method"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cookieName"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cookieMode"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="serverSslEnabled"/>
              <xs:element name="clientSsl"/>
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="clientAuth"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="serviceCertificate"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="pool">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="poolId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="transparent"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="algorithm"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorId"/>
              <xs:element name="member">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="memberId"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="weight"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorPort"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="minConn"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="maxConn"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="monitor">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="interval"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="timeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="maxRetries"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="method"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="url"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="applicationRule">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="script"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<loadBalancer>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <enableServiceInsertion></enableServiceInsertion>
  <accelerationEnabled></accelerationEnabled>
  <logging>
    <enable></enable>
    <logLevel></logLevel>
  </logging>
  <virtualServer>
    <virtualServerId></virtualServerId>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    <protocol></protocol>
    <port></port>
    <connectionLimit></connectionLimit>
    <connectionRateLimit></connectionRateLimit>
    <applicationProfileId></applicationProfileId>
    <defaultPoolId></defaultPoolId>
    <enableServiceInsertion></enableServiceInsertion>
    <accelerationEnabled></accelerationEnabled>
    <applicationRuleId></applicationRuleId>
  </virtualServer>
  <applicationProfile>
    <applicationProfileId></applicationProfileId>
    <name></name>
    <insertXForwardedFor></insertXForwardedFor>
    <sslPassthrough></sslPassthrough>
    <template></template>
    <persistence>
      <method></method>
      <cookieName></cookieName>
      <cookieMode></cookieMode>
    </persistence>
    <serverSslEnabled></serverSslEnabled>
    <clientSsl>
      <clientAuth></clientAuth>
      <serviceCertificate></serviceCertificate>
    </clientSsl>
  </applicationProfile>
  <pool>
    <poolId></poolId>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <transparent></transparent>
    <algorithm></algorithm>
    <monitorId></monitorId>
    <member>
      <memberId></memberId>
      <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      <weight></weight>
      <port></port>
      <monitorPort></monitorPort>
      <minConn></minConn>
      <maxConn></maxConn>
      <name></name>
    </member>
  </pool>
  <monitor>
    <monitorId></monitorId>
    <type></type>
    <interval></interval>
    <timeout></timeout>
    <maxRetries></maxRetries>
    <method></method>
    <url></url>
    <name></name>
  </monitor>
  <applicationRule>
    <name></name>
    <script></script>
  </applicationRule>
</loadBalancer>
Secured by basic

applicationProfiles /applicationprofiles post get delete

Application profiles define the behavior of a particular type of network traffic

post

Add an application profile

get

Retrieve all application profiles on Edge

delete

Delete all application profiles

post applicationProfiles /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/applicationprofiles

Add an application profile

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="applicationProfile">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="insertXForwardedFor"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sslPassthrough"/>
        <xs:element name="persistence">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="method"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cookieName"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cookieMode"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<applicationProfile>
  <name></name>
  <insertXForwardedFor></insertXForwardedFor>
  <sslPassthrough></sslPassthrough>
  <persistence>
    <method></method>
    <cookieName></cookieName>
    <cookieMode></cookieMode>
  </persistence>
</applicationProfile>
Secured by basic

applicationProfile /{appProfileID} put get delete

Modify or retrieve an application profile

put

Modify an application profile

get

Retrieve an application profile

delete

Delete an application profile

put applicationProfile /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/applicationprofiles/{appProfileID}

Modify an application profile

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

  • appProfileID: required (string)

    Specified application profile

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="applicationProfile">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="insertXForwardedFor"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sslPassthrough"/>
        <xs:element name="persistence">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="method"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cookieName"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cookieMode"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<applicationProfile>
  <name></name>
  <insertXForwardedFor></insertXForwardedFor>
  <sslPassthrough></sslPassthrough>
  <persistence>
    <method></method>
    <cookieName></cookieName>
    <cookieMode></cookieMode>
  </persistence>
</applicationProfile>
Secured by basic

post

get

Read all application rules

delete

Delete all application rules

post appRules /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/applicationrules

Add an application rule

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="applicationRule">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="script"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<applicationRule>
  <name></name>
  <script></script>
</applicationRule>

lbMonitors /monitors post get delete

Load balancer monitors define health check parameters for a particular type of network traffic

post

Add a load balancer monitor

get

Retrieve all load balancer monitors

delete

Delete all load balancer monitors

post lbMonitors /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/monitors

Add a load balancer monitor

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="monitor">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="interval"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="timeout"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="maxRetries"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="method"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="url"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<monitor>
  <type></type>
  <interval></interval>
  <timeout></timeout>
  <maxRetries></maxRetries>
  <method></method>
  <url></url>
  <name></name>
</monitor>
Secured by basic

  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

  • monitorID: required (string)

    Specified monitor

Secured by basic

put lbMonitor /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/monitors/{monitorID}

Modify a load balancer monitor

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

  • monitorID: required (string)

    Specified monitor

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="monitor">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="interval"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="timeout"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="maxRetries"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="method"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="url"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<monitor>
  <type></type>
  <interval></interval>
  <timeout></timeout>
  <maxRetries></maxRetries>
  <method></method>
  <url></url>
  <name></name>
</monitor>
Secured by basic

  • Security

    Specified Edge ID

  • monitorID: required (string)

    Specified monitor

virtualServers /virtualservers post get delete

You can add an NSX Edge internal or uplink interface as a virtual server

delete

Delete all

post virtualServers /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/virtualservers

Add a virtual server

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="virtualServer">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connectionLimit"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connectionRateLimit"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationProfileId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultPoolId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableServiceInsertion"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="accelerationEnabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="applicationRuleId"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<virtualServer>
  <name></name>
  <description></description>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <ipAddress></ipAddress>
  <protocol></protocol>
  <port></port>
  <connectionLimit></connectionLimit>
  <connectionRateLimit></connectionRateLimit>
  <applicationProfileId></applicationProfileId>
  <defaultPoolId></defaultPoolId>
  <enableServiceInsertion></enableServiceInsertion>
  <accelerationEnabled></accelerationEnabled>
  <applicationRuleId></applicationRuleId>
</virtualServer>
Secured by basic

  • Request

    Specified Edge ID

pools /pools post get delete

Server pools manage load balancer distribution methods and has a monitor attached to it for health check parameters

post

Add a load balancer server pool to the Edge

get

Get all backend pools for the specified NSX Edge

delete

Delete all backend pools configured on the specified NSX Edge

post pools /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/pools

Add a load balancer server pool to the Edge

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="pool">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="transparent"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="algorithm"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorId"/>
        <xs:element name="member">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="weight"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="minConn"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="maxConn"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorPort"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<pool>
  <name></name>
  <description></description>
  <transparent></transparent>
  <algorithm></algorithm>
  <monitorId></monitorId>
  <member>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    <weight></weight>
    <port></port>
    <minConn></minConn>
    <maxConn></maxConn>
    <name></name>
    <monitorPort></monitorPort>
  </member>
</pool>
Secured by basic

put pool /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/loadbalancer/config/pools/{poolID}

Modify the specified pool

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

  • poolID: required (string)

    Specified pool ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="pool">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="transparent"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="algorithm"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorId"/>
        <xs:element name="member">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="weight"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="minConn"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="maxConn"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="monitorPort"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<pool>
  <name></name>
  <description></description>
  <transparent></transparent>
  <algorithm></algorithm>
  <monitorId></monitorId>
  <member>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    <weight></weight>
    <port></port>
    <minConn></minConn>
    <maxConn></maxConn>
    <name></name>
    <monitorPort></monitorPort>
  </member>
</pool>

edgeDns /dns/config get put delete

Configure DNS servers to which vShield Edge can relay name resolution requests

get

Retrieve DNS configuration

put

Configure DNS servers

delete

Delete DNS configuration

get edgeDns /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dns/config

Retrieve DNS configuration

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put edgeDns /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dns/config

Configure DNS servers

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="dns">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element name="dnsServers">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="cacheSize"/>
        <xs:element name="listeners">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="logging">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logLevel"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enable"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<dns>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <dnsServers>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
  </dnsServers>
  <cacheSize></cacheSize>
  <listeners>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
  </listeners>
  <logging>
    <logLevel></logLevel>
    <enable></enable>
  </logging>
</dns>
Secured by basic

delete edgeDns /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dns/config

Delete DNS configuration

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

dhcp /dhcp/config get put delete

Configure DHCP for NSX Edge

get

Get DHCP configuration

put

Configure DHCP service

delete

Delete the DHCP configuration, restoring it to factory default

get dhcp /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config

Get DHCP configuration

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put dhcp /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config

Configure DHCP service

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="dhcp">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element name="staticBindings">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="staticBinding">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="macAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vmId"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicId"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hostname"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subnetMask"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultGateway"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainName"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryNameServer"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secondaryNameServer"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="leaseTime"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="autoConfigDNS"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="ipPools">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="ipPool">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipRange"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultGateway"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subnetMask"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainName"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryNameServer"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secondaryNameServer"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="leaseTime"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="autoConfigDNS"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="logging">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enable"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logLevel"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<dhcp>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <staticBindings>
    <staticBinding>
      <macAddress></macAddress>
      <vmId></vmId>
      <vnicId></vnicId>
      <hostname></hostname>
      <ipAddress></ipAddress>
      <subnetMask></subnetMask>
      <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
      <domainName></domainName>
      <primaryNameServer></primaryNameServer>
      <secondaryNameServer></secondaryNameServer>
      <leaseTime></leaseTime>
      <autoConfigDNS></autoConfigDNS>
    </staticBinding>
  </staticBindings>
  <ipPools>
    <ipPool>
      <ipRange></ipRange>
      <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
      <subnetMask></subnetMask>
      <domainName></domainName>
      <primaryNameServer></primaryNameServer>
      <secondaryNameServer></secondaryNameServer>
      <leaseTime></leaseTime>
      <autoConfigDNS></autoConfigDNS>
    </ipPool>
  </ipPools>
  <logging>
    <enable></enable>
    <logLevel></logLevel>
  </logging>
</dhcp>
Secured by basic

  • Security

dhcpPool /ippools post

Adding IP pools to DHCP configuration

post

Add an IP pool to the DHCP configuration. returns a pool ID within a Location HTTP header

post dhcpPool /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config/ippools

Add an IP pool to the DHCP configuration. returns a pool ID within a Location HTTP header

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="ipPool">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipRange"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultGateway"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainName"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryNameServer"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secondaryNameServer"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="leaseTime"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="autoConfigureDNS"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<ipPool>
  <ipRange></ipRange>
  <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
  <domainName></domainName>
  <primaryNameServer></primaryNameServer>
  <secondaryNameServer></secondaryNameServer>
  <leaseTime></leaseTime>
  <autoConfigureDNS></autoConfigureDNS>
</ipPool>

dhcpStaticBinding /bindings post

Adding static-binding to DHCP configuration.

post

Append a static-binding to DHCP config. A static-binding ID is returned within a Location HTTP header

post dhcpStaticBinding /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config/bindings

Append a static-binding to DHCP config. A static-binding ID is returned within a Location HTTP header

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="staticBinding">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vmId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hostname"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="defaultGateway"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="domainName"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryNameServer"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secondaryNameServer"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="leaseTime"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="autoConfigureDNS"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<staticBinding>
  <vmId></vmId>
  <vnicId></vnicId>
  <hostname></hostname>
  <ipAddress></ipAddress>
  <defaultGateway></defaultGateway>
  <domainName></domainName>
  <primaryNameServer></primaryNameServer>
  <secondaryNameServer></secondaryNameServer>
  <leaseTime></leaseTime>
  <autoConfigureDNS></autoConfigureDNS>
</staticBinding>
Secured by basic

dhcpRelay /relay get put delete

Configure DHCP relay

get

Query DHCP relay

put

Configure DHCP relay

delete

Delete DHCP relay configuration

get dhcpRelay /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config/relay

Query DHCP relay

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put dhcpRelay /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/dhcp/config/relay

Configure DHCP relay

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="relay">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="relayServer">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="groupingObjectId" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="fqdn"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="relayAgents">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="relayAgent">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnicIndex"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="giAddress"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<relay>
  <relayServer>
    <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
    <groupingObjectId></groupingObjectId>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
    <fqdn></fqdn>
  </relayServer>
  <relayAgents>
    <relayAgent>
      <vnicIndex></vnicIndex>
      <giAddress></giAddress>
    </relayAgent>
  </relayAgents>
</relay>
Secured by basic

  • Security

highAvailability /highavailability/config get put delete

Ensures that an Edge appliance is always available on your virtualized network.

get

Get high availability configuration

put

Configure high availability

delete

Delete high availability configuration

get highAvailability /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/highavailability/config

Get high availability configuration

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put highAvailability /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/highavailability/config

Configure high availability

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="highAvailability">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vnic"/>
        <xs:element name="ipAddresses">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="declareDeadTime"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<highAvailability>
  <vnic></vnic>
  <ipAddresses>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
  </ipAddresses>
  <declareDeadTime></declareDeadTime>
  <enabled></enabled>
</highAvailability>

  • Security

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put syslog /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/syslog/config

Configure syslog servers

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="syslog">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="protocol"/>
        <xs:element name="serverAddresses">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<syslog>
  <protocol></protocol>
  <serverAddresses>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
  </serverAddresses>
</syslog>
Secured by basic

delete syslog /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/syslog/config

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

sslVPN /sslvpn/config post get put delete

Manage SSL VPN

post

Enable or disable SSL VPN

get

Retrieve SSL VPN details

put

Reconfigure the entire SSL VPN

delete

Delete the SSL VPN configurations on the Edge

post sslVPN /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config

Enable or disable SSL VPN

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Query Parameters

  • enableService: required (boolean)

    Set to true to enable, false to disable

Secured by basic

get sslVPN /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config

Retrieve SSL VPN details

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put sslVPN /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config

Reconfigure the entire SSL VPN

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="logonLogoffScript">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="logonLogoffScript">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="objectId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="scriptFileId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<logonLogoffScript>
  <logonLogoffScript>
    <objectId></objectId>
    <scriptFileId></scriptFileId>
    <type></type>
    <enabled></enabled>
    <description></description>
  </logonLogoffScript>
</logonLogoffScript>
Secured by basic
