  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

serverSettings /server get put

Configure SSL VPN server on port 443 using the certificate named server-cert that is already uploaded on the NSX Edge appliance and the specified cipher

get

Get server settings

put

Apply server settings

get serverSettings /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/server

Get server settings

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put serverSettings /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/server

Apply server settings

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="serverSettings">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="serverAddresses">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipAddress"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="certificateId"/>
        <xs:element name="sslVersionList">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="version"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<serverSettings>
  <serverAddresses>
    <ipAddress></ipAddress>
  </serverAddresses>
  <port></port>
  <certificateId></certificateId>
  <sslVersionList>
    <version></version>
  </sslVersionList>
</serverSettings>
Secured by basic

privateNetworks /client/networkextension/privatenetworks post get put delete

Configure a private network to expose to remote users over SSL VPN tunnel

post

Add a private network

get

Get all private network profiles in the SSL VPN instance

put

Update all private network configs of NSX Edge with the given list of private network configs. If the config is present, it is updated; otherwise, a new private network config is created. Existing configs not included in the call body are deleted

delete

Delete all Private Networks from the SSL VPN instance

post privateNetworks /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/privatenetworks

Add a private network

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="privateNetwork">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="network"/>
        <xs:element name="sendOverTunnel">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ports"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="optimize"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<privateNetwork>
  <description></description>
  <network></network>
  <sendOverTunnel>
    <ports></ports>
    <optimize></optimize>
  </sendOverTunnel>
  <enabled></enabled>
</privateNetwork>
Secured by basic

get privateNetworks /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/privatenetworks

Get all private network profiles in the SSL VPN instance

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put privateNetwork /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/privatenetworks/{networkID}

Modify specified private network in the SSL VPN service

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

  • networkID: required (string)

    Specified private network

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="privateNetwork">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="network"/>
        <xs:element name="sendOverTunnel">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ports"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="optimize"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<privateNetwork>
  <description></description>
  <network></network>
  <sendOverTunnel>
    <ports></ports>
    <optimize></optimize>
  </sendOverTunnel>
  <enabled></enabled>
</privateNetwork>

netExtIpPools /client/networkextension/ippools post get put delete

IP pools to assign IP addresses to remote users

post

Create an IP pool

get

Get all IP pools configured on SSL VPN

put

Update all IP pools with the given list of pools. If the pool is present, it is updated; otherwise, a new pool is created. Existing pools not in the body are deleted

delete

Delete all IP pools configured on SSL VPN

post netExtIpPools /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/ippools

Create an IP pool

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="ipAddressPool">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipRange"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="netmask"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="gateway"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryDns"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secondaryDns"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="dnsSuffix"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="winsServer"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<ipAddressPool>
  <description></description>
  <ipRange></ipRange>
  <netmask></netmask>
  <gateway></gateway>
  <primaryDns></primaryDns>
  <secondaryDns></secondaryDns>
  <dnsSuffix></dnsSuffix>
  <winsServer></winsServer>
  <enabled></enabled>
</ipAddressPool>
Secured by basic

get netExtIpPools /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/ippools

put netExtIpPools /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/ippools

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="ipAddressPool">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ipRange"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="netmask"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="gateway"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryDns"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secondaryDns"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="dnsSuffix"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="winsServer"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

  <netmask></netmask>

clientConfig /client/networkextension/clientconfig put get

Advanced parameters for full access client configurations--such as whether client should auto-reconnect in case of network failures or network unavailability, or whether the client should be uninstalled after logout

put

Set parameters for full access client configurations

get

Get client configuration

put clientConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/clientconfig

Set parameters for full access client configurations

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="clientConfiguration">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="autoReconnect"/>
        <xs:element name="fullTunnel">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="excludeLocalSubnets"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="gatewayIp"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="upgradeNotification"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<clientConfiguration>
  <autoReconnect></autoReconnect>
  <fullTunnel>
    <excludeLocalSubnets></excludeLocalSubnets>
    <gatewayIp></gatewayIp>
  </fullTunnel>
  <upgradeNotification></upgradeNotification>
</clientConfiguration>
Secured by basic

get clientConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/clientconfig

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

installPackages /client/networkextension/installpackages post get put delete

Installation packages for SSL VPN clients

post

Create installers for full access network clients. These setup binaries are downloaded by remote clients and installed on their systems.

get

Get information about all installation packages

put

Update all installation packages with the given list. If the package is present, it is updated; otherwise a new installation package is created. Existing packages not included in the body are deleted.

delete

Delete all client installation packages

post installPackages /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/installpackages

Create installers for full access network clients. These setup binaries are downloaded by remote clients and installed on their systems.

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="clientInstallPackage">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="profileName"/>
        <xs:element name="gatewayList">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="gateway">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hostName"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="startClientOnLogon"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hideSystrayIcon"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="rememberPassword"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="silentModeOperation"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="silentModeInstallation"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hideNetworkAdaptor"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="createDesktopIcon"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enforceServerSecurityCertValidation"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="createLinuxClient"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="createMacClient"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<clientInstallPackage>
  <profileName></profileName>
  <gatewayList>
    <gateway>
      <hostName></hostName>
      <port></port>
    </gateway>
  </gatewayList>
  <startClientOnLogon></startClientOnLogon>
  <hideSystrayIcon></hideSystrayIcon>
  <rememberPassword></rememberPassword>
  <silentModeOperation></silentModeOperation>
  <silentModeInstallation></silentModeInstallation>
  <hideNetworkAdaptor></hideNetworkAdaptor>
  <createDesktopIcon></createDesktopIcon>
  <enforceServerSecurityCertValidation></enforceServerSecurityCertValidation>
  <createLinuxClient></createLinuxClient>
  <createMacClient></createMacClient>
  <description></description>
  <enabled></enabled>
</clientInstallPackage>
Secured by basic

get installPackage /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/installpackages/{packageID}

Get information about the specified installation package

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

  • packageID: required (string)

    Specified installation package ID

Secured by basic

put installPackage /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/client/networkextension/installpackages/{packageID}

Modify the specified installation package

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

  • packageID: required (string)

    Specified installation package ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="clientInstallPackage">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="profileName"/>
        <xs:element name="gatewayList">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="gateway">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hostName"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="startClientOnLogon"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hideSystrayIcon"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="rememberPassword"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="silentModeOperation"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="silentModeInstallation"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hideNetworkAdaptor"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="createDesktopIcon"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enforceServerSecurityCertValidation"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="createLinuxClient"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="createMacClient"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<clientInstallPackage>
  <profileName></profileName>
  <gatewayList>
    <gateway>
      <hostName></hostName>
      <port></port>
    </gateway>
  </gatewayList>
  <startClientOnLogon></startClientOnLogon>
  <hideSystrayIcon></hideSystrayIcon>
  <rememberPassword></rememberPassword>
  <silentModeOperation></silentModeOperation>
  <silentModeInstallation></silentModeInstallation>
  <hideNetworkAdaptor></hideNetworkAdaptor>
  <createDesktopIcon></createDesktopIcon>
  <enforceServerSecurityCertValidation></enforceServerSecurityCertValidation>
  <createLinuxClient></createLinuxClient>
  <createMacClient></createMacClient>
  <description></description>
  <enabled></enabled>
</clientInstallPackage>
Secured by basic

Secured by basic

/images put

put

Set the portal layout

put /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/layout/images

Set the portal layout

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="layout">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="portalTitle"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="companyName"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logoBackgroundColor"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="titleColor"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="topFrameColor"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="menuBarColor"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="rowAlternativeColor"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bodyColor"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="rowColor"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<layout>
  <portalTitle></portalTitle>
  <companyName></companyName>
  <logoBackgroundColor></logoBackgroundColor>
  <titleColor></titleColor>
  <topFrameColor></topFrameColor>
  <menuBarColor></menuBarColor>
  <rowAlternativeColor></rowAlternativeColor>
  <bodyColor></bodyColor>
  <rowColor></rowColor>
</layout>
Secured by basic

webResources /webresources post get delete

Web access server that a remote user can connect to via a web browser

post

Add portal web resource

get

Get all web resources on the SSL VPN instance

delete

Delete all web resources on the SSL VPN instance

post webResources /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/webresources

Add portal web resource

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="webResource">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="url"/>
        <xs:element name="method">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="data"/>
            </xs:sequence>
            <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="name"/>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<webResource>
  <name></name>
  <url></url>
  <method name="">
    <data></data>
  </method>
  <description></description>
  <enabled></enabled>
</webResource>
Secured by basic

sslVPNUsers /auth/localserver/users post put delete

Portal users

post

Add a new portal user

put

Modify the specified portal user

delete

Delete all users on the specifed SSL VPN instance

post sslVPNUsers /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/localserver/users

Add a new portal user

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="user">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="userId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="firstName"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="lastName"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="disableUserAccount"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="passwordNeverExpires"/>
        <xs:element name="allowChangePassword">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="changePasswordOnNextLogin"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<user>
  <userId></userId>
  <password></password>
  <firstName></firstName>
  <lastName></lastName>
  <description></description>
  <disableUserAccount></disableUserAccount>
  <passwordNeverExpires></passwordNeverExpires>
  <allowChangePassword>
    <changePasswordOnNextLogin></changePasswordOnNextLogin>
  </allowChangePassword>
</user>
Secured by basic

put sslVPNUsers /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/localserver/users

Modify the specified portal user

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="user">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="userId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="firstName"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="lastName"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="disableUserAccount"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="passwordNeverExpires"/>
        <xs:element name="allowChangePassword">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="changePasswordOnNextLogin"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<user>
  <userId></userId>
  <password></password>
  <firstName></firstName>
  <lastName></lastName>
  <description></description>
  <disableUserAccount></disableUserAccount>
  <passwordNeverExpires></passwordNeverExpires>
  <allowChangePassword>
    <changePasswordOnNextLogin></changePasswordOnNextLogin>
  </allowChangePassword>
</user>

authSettings /auth/settings get put

Authentication settings

get

Get information about authentication server

put

Set authentication process for remote users. Specify username/password authentication, active directory, ldap, radius, client certificate based authentication

get authSettings /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/settings

Get information about authentication server

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put authSettings /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/auth/settings

Set authentication process for remote users. Specify username/password authentication, active directory, ldap, radius, client certificate based authentication

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="authenticationConfig">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="passwordAuthentication">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="authenticationTimeout"/>
              <xs:element name="primaryAuthServers">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LdapAuthServerDto">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ip"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="timeOut"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableSsl"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="searchBase"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bindDomainName"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bindPassword"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loginAttributeName"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="searchFilter"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RadiusAuthServerDto">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ip"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="timeOut"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="secret"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="nasIp"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="retryCount"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LocalAuthServerDto">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                          <xs:element name="passwordPolicy">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="minLength"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="maxLength"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="minAlphabets"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="minDigits"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="minSpecialChar"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="allowUserIdWithinPassword"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="passwordLifeTime"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="expiryNotification"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element name="accountLockoutPolicy">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="retryCount"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="retryDuration"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="lockoutDuration"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RsaAuthServerDto">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="timeOut"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sourceIp"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="secondaryAuthServer">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.AdAuthServerDto">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="ip"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="port"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="timeOut"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableSsl"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="searchBase"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bindDomainName"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="bindPassword"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="loginAttributeName"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="searchFilter"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="terminateSessionOnAuthFails"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<authenticationConfig>
  <passwordAuthentication>
  <authenticationTimeout></authenticationTimeout>
    <primaryAuthServers>
      <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LdapAuthServerDto>
        <ip></ip>
        <port></port>
        <timeOut></timeOut>
        <enableSsl></enableSsl>
        <searchBase></searchBase>
        <bindDomainName></bindDomainName>
        <bindPassword></bindPassword>
        <loginAttributeName></loginAttributeName>
        <searchFilter></searchFilter>
        <enabled></enabled>
      </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LdapAuthServerDto>
      <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RadiusAuthServerDto>
        <ip></ip>
        <port></port>
        <timeOut></timeOut>
        <secret></secret>
        <nasIp></nasIp>
        <retryCount></retryCount>
      </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RadiusAuthServerDto>
      <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LocalAuthServerDto>
        <enabled></enabled>
        <passwordPolicy>
          <minLength></minLength>
          <maxLength></maxLength>
          <minAlphabets></minAlphabets>
          <minDigits></minDigits>
          <minSpecialChar></minSpecialChar>
          <allowUserIdWithinPassword></allowUserIdWithinPassword>
          <passwordLifeTime></passwordLifeTime>
          <expiryNotification></expiryNotification>
        </passwordPolicy>
        <accountLockoutPolicy>
          <retryCount></retryCount>
          <retryDuration></retryDuration>
          <lockoutDuration></lockoutDuration>
        </accountLockoutPolicy>
      </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.LocalAuthServerDto>
      <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RsaAuthServerDto>
        <timeOut></timeOut>
        <sourceIp></sourceIp>
      </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.RsaAuthServerDto>
    </primaryAuthServers>
    <secondaryAuthServer>
      <com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.AdAuthServerDto>
        <ip>1.1.1.1</ip>
        <port>90</port>
        <timeOut>20</timeOut>
        <enableSsl>false</enableSsl>
        <searchBase>searchbasevalue</searchBase>
        <bindDomainName>binddnvalue</bindDomainName>
        <bindPassword>password</bindPassword>
        <loginAttributeName>cain</loginAttributeName>
        <searchFilter>found</searchFilter>
        <terminateSessionOnAuthFails>false</terminateSessionOnAuthFails>
        <enabled>true</enabled>
      </com.vmware.vshield.edge.sslvpn.dto.AdAuthServerDto>
    </secondaryAuthServer>
  </passwordAuthentication>
</authenticationConfig>
Secured by basic

rsaConfig /rsaconfigfile post

post

  • Security

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

advancedConfig /advancedconfig get put

SSL VPN advanced configuration

get

put

get advancedConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/advancedconfig

Retrieve SSL VPN advanced configuration

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put advancedConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/advancedconfig

Apply advanced configuration

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="advancedConfig">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableCompression"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="forceVirtualKeyboard"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="preventMultipleLogon"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="randomizeVirtualkeys"/>
        <xs:element name="timeout">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="forcedTimeout"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="sessionIdleTimeout"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="clientNotification"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enablePublicUrlAccess"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enableLogging"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<advancedConfig>
  <enableCompression></enableCompression>
  <forceVirtualKeyboard></forceVirtualKeyboard>
  <preventMultipleLogon></preventMultipleLogon>
  <randomizeVirtualkeys></randomizeVirtualkeys>
  <timeout>
    <forcedTimeout></forcedTimeout>
    <sessionIdleTimeout></sessionIdleTimeout>
  </timeout>
  <clientNotification></clientNotification>
  <enablePublicUrlAccess></enablePublicUrlAccess>
  <enableLogging></enableLogging>
</advancedConfig>
Secured by basic

script /script post get put delete

Logon and logoff scripts for NSX Edge gateway

post

Configure parameters associated with the uploaded script file

get

Retrieve all script configurations for the Edge

put

Update all script configurations with the given list of configurations. If the config is present, its is updated; otherwise, a new config is created. Existing configs not included in the body are deleted

delete

Delete all script configurations

post script /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/script

Configure parameters associated with the uploaded script file

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="logonLogoffScript">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="scriptFileId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<logonLogoffScript>
  <scriptFileId></scriptFileId>
  <type></type>
  <description></description>
  <enabled></enabled>
</logonLogoffScript>
Secured by basic

scriptFile /file post

Logon and logoff scripts for NSX Edge gateway

post

Upload a login/logoff script. Returns a script file ID to configure the parameters

post scriptFile /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/config/script/file

Upload a login/logoff script. Returns a script file ID to configure the parameters

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

allUsers /sslvpn/auth/localusers/users put

All users of NSX Edge

put

Update all users with the given list of users. If the user is present, it is updated. Otherwise, and new user is created. Existing users not included in the body are deleted.

put allUsers /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/auth/localusers/users

Update all users with the given list of users. If the user is present, it is updated. Otherwise, and new user is created. Existing users not included in the body are deleted.

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="users">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="user">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="userId"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="password"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="firstName"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="lastName"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="disableUserAccount"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="passwordNeverExpires"/>
              <xs:element name="allowChangePassword">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="changePasswordOnNextLogin"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<users>
  <user>
    <userId></userId>
    <password></password>
    <firstName></firstName>
    <lastName></lastName>
    <description></description>
    <disableUserAccount></disableUserAccount>
    <passwordNeverExpires></passwordNeverExpires>
    <allowChangePassword>
      <changePasswordOnNextLogin></changePasswordOnNextLogin>
    </allowChangePassword>
  </user>
</users>
Secured by basic

sslVPNActiveClients /sslvpn/activesessions get

Working with active clients

get

Retrieve a list of active clients for the SSL VPN session

get sslVPNActiveClients /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/sslvpn/activesessions

Retrieve a list of active clients for the SSL VPN session

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

Specified client session

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

  • sessionID: required (string)

    Specified client session

Secured by basic

sslVPNStats /statistics/dashboard/sslvpn get

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Query Parameters

  • interval: (string)

    Specify a range; can be 1 - 60 minutes, or oneDay|oneWeek| oneMonth|oneYear. Default is 60 minutes

Secured by basic

  • Security

    Specified Edge ID

l2VPN /l2vpn/config post get put delete

L2 VPN allows you to configure a tunnel between two sites. VM's remain on the same subnet in spite of being moved between these sites, enabling you to extend your datacenter. An NSX Edge at one site can provide all services to VM's on the other site.

post

Enable or disable L2 VPN service according to the value of the query parameter "enableService"

get

Retrieve the current L2VPN configuration for NSX Edge

put

Configure L2VPN for server or client

delete

Delete L2 VPN

post l2VPN /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

Enable or disable L2 VPN service according to the value of the query parameter "enableService"

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Query Parameters

  • enableService: required (boolean)

    Enable or disable L2 VPN

Secured by basic

get l2VPN /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

Retrieve the current L2VPN configuration for NSX Edge

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put l2VPN /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

Configure L2VPN for server or client

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Example:

<l2Vpn>
  <enabled>true</enabled>
  <logging>
    <enable>false</enable>
    <logLevel>info</logLevel>
    </logging>
    <l2VpnSites>
    <l2VpnSite>
      <server>
        <configuration>
          <listenerIp></listenerIp>
          <listenerPort></listenerPort>
          <encryptionAlgorithm></encryptionAlgorithm>
          <serverCertificate></serverCertificate>
          <peerSites>
            <peerSite>
              <name></name>
              <description></description>
              <l2VpnUser>
                <userId></userId>
                <password></password>
              </l2VpnUser>
              <vnics>
                <index></index>
              </vnics>
              <egressOptimization>
                <gatewayIpAddress></gatewayIpAddress>
              </egressOptimization>
              <enabled></enabled>
            </peerSite>
          </peerSites>
        </configuration>
      </server>
    </l2VpnSite>
  </l2VpnSites>
</l2Vpn>
Secured by basic

delete l2VPN /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/l2vpn/config

Delete L2 VPN

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Example:

<ipsec>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <logLevel></logLevel>
  <enable></enable>
  <global>
    <psk></psk>
    <serviceCertificate></serviceCertificate>
    <caCertificates>
      <caCertificate></caCertificate>
    </caCertificates>
    <crlCertificates>
      <crlCertificate></crlCertificate>
    </crlCertificates>
  </global>
  <sites>
    <site>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <name></name>
      <description></description>
      <localId></localId>
      <localIp></localIp>
      <peerId></peerId>
      <peerIp></peerIp>
      <encryptionAlgorithm></encryptionAlgorithm>
      <authenticationMode>psk</authenticationMode>
      <psk></psk>
      <enablePfs></enablePfs>
      <dhGroup></dhGroup>
      <localSubnets>
        <subnet></subnet>
      </localSubnets>
      <peerSubnets>
        <subnet></subnet>
      </peerSubnets>
    </site>
  </sites>
</ipsec>
Secured by basic

autoConfig /autoconfiguration get put

Auto config is enabled by default. If you disable, you must add required NAT, firewall, routing rules

get

put

get autoConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/autoconfiguration

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put autoConfig /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/autoconfiguration

Change the auto configuration settings for the NSX Edge

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="autoConfiguration">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="enabled"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="rulePriority"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<autoConfiguration>
  <enabled></enabled>
  <rulePriority></rulePriority>
</autoConfiguration>
Secured by basic

appliances /appliances post get put

post

put

  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Query Parameters

  • size: required (string)

    set to compact|large|xlarge

appliance /{haIndex} get put delete

Manage a specified appliance using its HA index

get

Get configuration of specified appliance

put

Modify the configuration of the specified appliance

delete

Delete the appliance

get appliance /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances/{haIndex}

Get configuration of specified appliance

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

  • haIndex: required (string)

    Specified appliance HA index

Secured by basic

put appliance /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances/{haIndex}

Modify the configuration of the specified appliance

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

  • haIndex: required (string)

    Specified appliance HA index

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="appliance">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="resourcePoolId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="datastoreId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="hostId"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="vmFolderId"/>
        <xs:element name="customField">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="key"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="cpuReservation">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="limit"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="reservation"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="shares"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="memoryReservation">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="limit"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="reservation"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="shares"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<appliance>
  <resourcePoolId></resourcePoolId>
  <datastoreId></datastoreId>
  <hostId></hostId>
  <vmFolderId></vmFolderId>
  <customField>
    <key></key>
    <value></value>
  </customField>
  <cpuReservation>
    <limit></limit>
    <reservation></reservation>
    <shares></shares>
  </cpuReservation>
  <memoryReservation>
    <limit></limit>
    <reservation></reservation>
    <shares></shares>
  </memoryReservation>
</appliance>
Secured by basic

delete appliance /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/appliances/{haIndex}

Delete the appliance

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

  • haIndex: required (string)

    Specified appliance HA index

Secured by basic

vnics /vnics post get

Working with interfaces. Add up to ten internal/uplink interfaces to each Edge. Each Edge must have at least one internal interface

post

Add an interface or sub interface

get

Retrieve all interfaces for Edge

post vnics /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/vnics

Add an interface or sub interface

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Query Parameters

  • action: required (string)

    always set to "patch"

Body

Type: application/xml

Example:

<vnics>
  <vnic>
    <name></name>
    <addressGroups>
      <addressGroup>
        <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
        <secondaryAddresses>
          <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        </secondaryAddresses>
        <subnetMask></subnetMask>
      </addressGroup>
    </addressGroups>
    <mtu></mtu>
    <type></type>
    <index></index>
    <portgroupId></portgroupId>
    <portgroupName></portgroupName>
    <macAddress>
      <edgeVmHaIndex></edgeVmHaIndex>
      <value></value>
    </macAddress>
    <fenceParameter>
      <key></key>
      <value></value>
    </fenceParameter>
    <enableProxyArp></enableProxyArp>
    <enableSendRedirects></enableSendRedirects>
    <enableBridgeMode></enableBridgeMode>
    <isConnected></isConnected>
    <inShapingPolicy>
      <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
      <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
      <burstSize></burstSize>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <inherited></inherited>
    </inShapingPolicy>
    <outShapingPolicy>
      <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
      <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
      <burstSize></burstSize>
      <enabled></enabled>
      <inherited></inherited>
    </outShapingPolicy>
  </vnic>
</vnics>
Secured by basic

get vnics /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/vnics

  • Request
  • Security

    Specified Edge ID

    <name></name>

        <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>

          <ipAddress></ipAddress>
        </secondaryAddresses>
        <subnetMask></subnetMask>
      </addressGroup>
    </addressGroups>
    <mtu></mtu>
    <type></type>
    <index></index>
    <portgroupId></portgroupId>
    <portgroupName></portgroupName>
    <macAddress>
      <edgeVmHaIndex></edgeVmHaIndex>
      <value></value>
    </macAddress>

      <key></key>
      <value></value>
    </fenceParameter>

    <enableSendRedirects></enableSendRedirects>
    <enableBridgeMode></enableBridgeMode>

      <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>

      <inherited></inherited>
    </inShapingPolicy>
    <outShapingPolicy>
      <averageBandwidth></averageBandwidth>
      <peakBandwidth></peakBandwidth>
      <burstSize></burstSize>
      <enabled></enabled>

  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Secured by basic

put mgmtInterface /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/mgmtinterface

Configure management interfaces for NSX Edge router

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="mgmtInterface">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="addressGroups">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="addressGroup">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryAddress"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subnetMask"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connectedToId"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<mgmtInterface>
  <addressGroups>
    <addressGroup>
      <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
      <subnetMask></subnetMask>
    </addressGroup>
  </addressGroups>
  <mtu></mtu>
  <connectedToId></connectedToId>
</mgmtInterface>
Secured by basic

interfaces /interfaces post get delete

Working with all NSX Edge router interfaces

post

Add interfaces for NSX Edge router. Can have up to 8 uplink interfaces

get

Retrieve all interfaces for Edge router

delete

Delete interfaces

post interfaces /4.0/edges/{edgeId}/interfaces

Add interfaces for NSX Edge router. Can have up to 8 uplink interfaces

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeId: required (string)

    Specified Edge ID

Query Parameters

  • action: required (string)

    Always set to 'patch'

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="interfaces">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="interface">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element name="addressGroups">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element name="addressGroup">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="primaryAddress"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="subnetMask"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="mtu"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="type"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isConnected"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="connectedToId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<interfaces>
  <interface>
    <name></name>
    <addressGroups>
      <addressGroup>
        <primaryAddress></primaryAddress>
        <subnetMask></subnetMask>
      </addressGroup>
    </addressGroups>
    <mtu></mtu>
    <type></type>
    <isConnected></isConnected>
    <connectedToId></connectedToId>
  </interface>
</interfaces>
Secured by basic

  • Request

    Specified Edge ID

    Specified Edge ID

    Specify index of interface to delete (e.g. ?index=&index=). If no indices specified, all interfaces are deleted

nsxEdgeJobs /jobs get

NSX Edge async jobs

get

Query jobs. Assumes Edge is configured in async mode, where ?async=true is used at the end of any 4.0 service configuration URI for POST, PUT, and DELETE calls.

get nsxEdgeJobs /4.0/edges/jobs

Query jobs. Assumes Edge is configured in async mode, where ?async=true is used at the end of any 4.0 service configuration URI for POST, PUT, and DELETE calls.

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Query Parameters

  • status: (string)

    status set to "all" or "active"

Secured by basic

nsxEdgeJob /{jobId} get

Status of Edge async jobs. Assumes Edge is configured in async mode, where ?async=true is used at the end of any 4.0 service configuration URI for POST, PUT, and DELETE calls.

get

Retrieve job status (SUCCESS/FAILED/QUEUED/RUNNING/ROLLBACK), URI of the resource, and ID of the resource as shown in response body

get nsxEdgeJob /4.0/edges/jobs/{jobId}

Retrieve job status (SUCCESS/FAILED/QUEUED/RUNNING/ROLLBACK), URI of the resource, and ID of the resource as shown in response body

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • jobId: required (string)

    Job ID

Secured by basic

nsxEdgeUpgrade

Upgrading NSX Edge

nsxEdgeUpgrade /3.0/edges/{edgeID} post

post

Upgrade NSX Edge

post nsxEdgeUpgrade /3.0/edges/{edgeID}

Upgrade NSX Edge

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • edgeID: required (string)

    Specified Edge

Query Parameters

  • action: required (string)

    Set this to 'upgrade'

Secured by basic

truststore

Operation on truststore (certificates)

certificate /certificate post

Certificates and certificate chains

post

Create certificate for CSR

post certificate /2.0/services/truststore/certificate

Create certificate for CSR

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="trustObject">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="pemEncoding"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<trustObject>
  <pemEncoding></pemEncoding>
</trustObject>
Secured by basic

certificateScope /scope/{scopeId} get

Certificates for a scope

get

Query all certificates for a scope

get certificateScope /2.0/services/truststore/certificate/scope/{scopeId}

Query all certificates for a scope

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • scopeId: required (string)

    Scope ID

Secured by basic

certificateSelfSigned /{scopeId} post

Working with vShield Edge self-signed certificates

post

Create a single certificate

post certificateSelfSigned /2.0/services/truststore/certificate/{scopeId}

Create a single certificate

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • scopeId: required (string)

    Scope ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="trustObject">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="pemEncoding"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="privateKey"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="passphrase"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<trustObject>
  <pemEncoding></pemEncoding>
  <privateKey></privateKey>
  <passphrase></passphrase>
</trustObject>
Secured by basic

certificate /{certificateId} get delete

Certificate specified by ID

get

Retrieve the certificate object specified by ID. If the ID specifies a chain, multiple certificate objects are retrieved.

delete

Delete the specified certificate

get certificate /2.0/services/truststore/certificate/{certificateId}

Retrieve the certificate object specified by ID. If the ID specifies a chain, multiple certificate objects are retrieved.

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • certificateId: required (string)

    certificate ID

Secured by basic

delete certificate /2.0/services/truststore/certificate/{certificateId}

Delete the specified certificate

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • certificateId: required (string)

    certificate ID

Secured by basic

csrCreate /csr/{scopeId} post

Create Certificate Signing Requests (CSRs)

post

Create a CSR

post csrCreate /2.0/services/truststore/csr/{scopeId}

Create a CSR

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • scopeId: required (string)

    Specified scope ID

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="csr">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="subject">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element name="attribute">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="key"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="value"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="algorithm"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="keySize"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<csr>
  <subject>
    <attribute>
      <key></key>
      <value></value>
    </attribute>
  </subject>
  <algorithm></algorithm>
  <keySize></keySize>
</csr>
Secured by basic

csrSelfSigned /csr/{csrId} put get

Self signed certificate for CSR

put

Create a self signed certificate for CSR

get

put csrSelfSigned /2.0/services/truststore/csr/{csrId}

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • csrId: required (string)

    CSR ID

Query Parameters

  • noOfDays: required (string)
Secured by basic

get csrSelfSigned /2.0/services/truststore/csr/{csrId}

  • Request
  • Security

  • csrId: required (string)

    CSR ID

post crlScopeCreate /2.0/services/truststore/crl/{scopeId}

    Specified scope

Type: application/xml

Schema:

  <xs:element name="trustObject">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="pemEncoding"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Secured by basic

policy

Operations on policy objects

securityPolicy /securitypolicy post

Working with security policies (Endpoint, firewall, network introspection services applied to security group)

post

Create a security policy

post securityPolicy /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy

Create a security policy

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="securityPolicy">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="precedence"/>
        <xs:element name="parent">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="objectId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="securityGroupBinding">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="objectId"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
        <xs:element name="actionsByCategory">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="category"/>
              <xs:element name="action">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="category"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="actionType"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isActionEnforced"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isActive"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isEnabled"/>
                    <xs:element name="secondarySecurityGroup">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="objectId"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element name="applications">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element name="application">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="objectId"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element name="applicationGroup">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="objectId"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
                    <xs:element name="scope">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="objectTypeName"/>
                        </xs:sequence>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                  </xs:sequence>
                  <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="class"/>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="outsideSecondaryContainer"/>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<securityPolicy>
  <name></name>
  <description></description>
  <precedence></precedence>
  <parent>
    <objectId></objectId>
  </parent>
  <securityGroupBinding>
    <objectId></objectId>
  </securityGroupBinding>
  <actionsByCategory>
    <category></category>
    <action class="">
      <name></name>
      <description></description>
      <category></category>
      <actionType></actionType>
      <isActionEnforced></isActionEnforced>
      <isActive></isActive>
      <isEnabled></isEnabled>
      <secondarySecurityGroup>
        <objectId></objectId>
      </secondarySecurityGroup>
      <applications>
        <application>
          <objectId></objectId>
        </application>
        <applicationGroup>
          <objectId></objectId>
        </applicationGroup>
      </applications>
      <logged></logged>
      <scope>
        <id></id>
        <name></name>
        <objectTypeName></objectTypeName>
      </scope>
    </action>
    <direction></direction>
    <outsideSecondaryContainer></outsideSecondaryContainer>
    </actionsByCategory>
</securityPolicy>
Secured by basic

securityPolicyID /{ID} get put delete

Specific security policy

get

Retrieve security policy information

put

Edit a security policy

delete

Delete a security policy

get securityPolicyID /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/{ID}

Retrieve security policy information

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • ID: required (string)

    ID of desired security policy (or 'all' to include all security policies for the securityPolicyID read method)

Secured by basic

put securityPolicyID /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/{ID}

Edit a security policy

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • ID: required (string)

    ID of desired security policy (or 'all' to include all security policies for the securityPolicyID read method)

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="securityPolicy">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element name="securityPolicy">
          <xs:complexType>
            <xs:sequence>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
              <xs:element type="xs:string" name="precedence"/>
              <xs:element name="parent">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="objectId"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="securityGroupBinding">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="objectId"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
              <xs:element name="actionsByCategory">
                <xs:complexType>
                  <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="category"/>
                    <xs:element name="action">
                      <xs:complexType>
                        <xs:sequence>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="category"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="actionType"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isActionEnforced"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isActive"/>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="isEnabled"/>
                          <xs:element name="secondarySecurityGroup">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="objectId"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element name="applications">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element name="application">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="objectId"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                                <xs:element name="applicationGroup">
                                  <xs:complexType>
                                    <xs:sequence>
                                      <xs:element type="xs:string" name="objectId"/>
                                    </xs:sequence>
                                  </xs:complexType>
                                </xs:element>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                          <xs:element type="xs:string" name="logged"/>
                          <xs:element name="scope">
                            <xs:complexType>
                              <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="id"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
                                <xs:element type="xs:string" name="objectTypeName"/>
                              </xs:sequence>
                            </xs:complexType>
                          </xs:element>
                        </xs:sequence>
                        <xs:attribute type="xs:string" name="class"/>
                      </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="direction"/>
                    <xs:element type="xs:string" name="outsideSecondaryContainer"/>
                  </xs:sequence>
                </xs:complexType>
              </xs:element>
            </xs:sequence>
          </xs:complexType>
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<securityPolicy>
  <securityPolicy>
    <name></name>
    <description></description>
    <precedence></precedence>
    <parent>
      <objectId></objectId>
    </parent>
    <securityGroupBinding>
      <objectId></objectId>
    </securityGroupBinding>
    <actionsByCategory>
      <category></category>
      <action class="">
        <name></name>
        <description></description>
        <category></category>
        <actionType></actionType>
        <isActionEnforced></isActionEnforced>
        <isActive></isActive>
        <isEnabled></isEnabled>
        <secondarySecurityGroup>
          <objectId></objectId>
        </secondarySecurityGroup>
        <applications>
          <application>
            <objectId></objectId>
          </application>
          <applicationGroup>
            <objectId></objectId>
          </applicationGroup>
        </applications>
        <logged></logged>
        <scope>
          <id></id>
          <name></name>
          <objectTypeName></objectTypeName>
        </scope>
      </action>
      <direction></direction>
      <outsideSecondaryContainer></outsideSecondaryContainer>
    </actionsByCategory>
  </securityPolicy>
</securityPolicy>
Secured by basic

delete securityPolicyID /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/{ID}

Delete a security policy

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

URI Parameters

  • ID: required (string)

    ID of desired security policy (or 'all' to include all security policies for the securityPolicyID read method)

Query Parameters

  • force: (boolean)

    If set to true, security policy is deleted even if it is being used somewhere

Secured by basic

hierarchy /hierarchy post get

Security policy configuration import/export

post

Import a security policy configuration

get

Export a Service Composer configuration and save to your desktop for use as a backup

post hierarchy /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/hierarchy

Import a security policy configuration

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Query Parameters

  • suffix: (string)

    (optional) Added after names

Body

Type: application/xml

Schema:

<xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:element name="securityPolicyHierarchy">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="name"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="securityPolicy"/>
        <xs:element type="xs:string" name="securityGroup"/>
      </xs:sequence>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
</xs:schema>

Example:

<securityPolicyHierarchy>
  <name></name>
  <description></description>
  <securityPolicy></securityPolicy>
  <securityGroup></securityGroup>
</securityPolicyHierarchy>
Secured by basic

get hierarchy /2.0/services/policy/securitypolicy/hierarchy

Export a Service Composer configuration and save to your desktop for use as a backup

Secured by basic
  • Request
  • Security

Query Parameters

  • policyIds: (string)

    Comma separated security policy id's

  • prefix: (string)

    (optional) Some prefix to add before the names of the objects in the exported XML

Secured by basic
